Moderate Backlash All creatures become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Przysłonięty} to you as they are covered in visual distortions only you can see.

Severe Backlash You become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.3uh1r86TzbQvosxv]{Doomed 1} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Wyniszczony 2} until your next daily preparations.

Effect: Endemic Herbs.name: Efekt: Endemic Herbs
Effect: Endemic Herbs.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.BQzExsEZrwGsJD66]{Endemic Herbs}

You gain a benefit matching the location where the item was created.

  • Aquatic You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to Fortitude saves.
  • Forest You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to saves against disease and poison effects.
  • Mountain You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to Reflex saves.
  • Plains You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to Will saves.
  • Underground You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to Perception.

Effect: Enduring Debilitating Strike.name: Efekt: Enduring Debilitating Strike
Effect: Enduring Debilitating Strike.description:
The target has been affected by a rogue's @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.bp0Up04x3dzGK5bB]{Debilitating Strike} if the rogue also has @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.RzfWrOqHL2GcK0rr]{Enduring Debilitation}.

Note: this effect only tracks the duration of the debilitation. You need to manually apply the specific penalties the rogue chose to apply.

Effect: Energetic Meltdown.name: Efekt: Energetic Meltdown
Effect: Energetic Meltdown.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.8PjTI21Mif26XWY7]{Energetic Meltdown}

Mild Backlash You take @Damage[(@actor.level)[untyped]]{damage equal to your level} as energy scours your body.

Moderate Backlash After taking the damage, you gain weakness to the energy type of your backlash until your next daily preparations. The weakness is equal to one-third of your level. You also lose immunity to the energy type if you had it, until your next daily preparations.

Severe Backlash You deal @Damage[(@actor.level)d6[untyped]]{1k6 damage per level} to all creatures in a @Template[emanation|distance:30] with a @Check[fortitude|against:class-spell|basic] save. You automatically take full damage without attempting a save.

Effect: Energize Wings.name: Efekt: Energize Wings
Effect: Energize Wings.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.cmhfYMEM4uzrNIiV]{Energize Wings}

You gain a fly Speed of 30 feet.

Effect: Energy Ablation.name: Efekt: Ablacja Energii
Effect: Energy Ablation.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.iS4Vc2zv7vgL5mnX]{Ablację Energii}

Zyskujesz odporność na wybrany przez siebie typ obrażeń od energii równą kręgowi zaklęcia.

Effect: Energy Shot.name: Efekt: Energy Shot
Effect: Energy Shot.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.TSDbyYRQwhIyY2Oq]{Energy Shot}

On your first three Strikes of this encounter with a firearm or crossbow, you deal an additional 1 acid, cold, fire or electricity damage. You choose which damage type to deal as part of making each Strike.

Effect: Energy Ward.name: Efekt: Energy Ward
Effect: Energy Ward.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.lG4dYrnkE42IgnGG]{Energy Ward}

You gain resistance to one type of energy (acid, cold, electricity, fire, force, sonic, vitality, or void) equal to 4 + the rank of the spell.

Effect: Enforce Oath.name: Efekt: Enforce Oath
Effect: Enforce Oath.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.g0C3tqGjgShoDyif]{Enforce Oath}

You gain a +1 status bonus to AC and saves against attacks and effects by the chosen creature. You also gain a +1 status bonus to attack rolls against the chosen creature.

You also take a –1 status penalty to AC, attack rolls, and saves against all other creatures until you stop Enforcing your Oath.

Effect: Engine of Destruction.name: Efekt: Engine of Destruction
Effect: Engine of Destruction.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.GLHh9MWlcINLC6Q0]{Engine of Destruction}

Your construct innovation gains a +2 circumstance bonus to its attack rolls.

Effect: Enjoy the Show.name: Efekt: Enjoy the Show
Effect: Enjoy the Show.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Igt8Ml5YIdxueMlF]{Enjoy the Show}

You take a circumstance penalty to attack rolls against creatures other than you, or a +1 circumstance bonus to attack rolls targeting you.

Effect: Enlightened Presence.name: Efekt: Enlightened Presence
Effect: Enlightened Presence.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.ROnjdPMvH0vkkWjQ]{Enlightened Presence}.

You and allies within 15 feet of you gain a +2 status bonus to Will saving throws against mental effects.

Effect: Enter Spirit Trance.name: Efekt: Enter Spirit Trance
Effect: Enter Spirit Trance.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.djULKW76BbSoN3zb]{Enter Spirit Trance}

You gain temporary Hit Points equal to your level plus your Constitution modifier, a +1 status bonus to Fortitude and Will saving throws, and your melee Strikes deal 1 additional spirit damage.

Effect: Entity's Resurgence.name: Efekt: Entity's Resurgence
Effect: Entity's Resurgence.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.5bCZGpp9yFHXDz1j]{Entity's Resurgence}

You remain at 1 Hit Point and gain temporary Hit Points equal to your level + your key ability modifier. However, the entity is in control. While the entity is in control, you gain a +1 status bonus to attack rolls and damage rolls.

Effect: Envenom Fangs.name: Efekt: Envenom Fangs
Effect: Envenom Fangs.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.IY86Kvopp4ACuQsw]{Envenom Fangs}

The next fangs Strike deals an additional 1k6 persistent poison damage.

Effect: Eternal Torch.name: Efekt: Eternal Torch
Effect: Eternal Torch.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.MRT8BGiIiVYfVcXh]{Eternal Torch}

You create a torch-like flame. If you create a flame on a weapon, you still need to use it as an improvised weapon to attack with the flame, just as with a torch.

Effect: Exalted Reaction (Desecrator).name: Efekt: Exalted Reaction (Desecrator)
Effect: Exalted Reaction (Desecrator).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.8YIA0jh64Ecz0TG6]{Desecration}

Each enemy in your champion's aura takes a –1 status penalty to attack rolls against you.

Effect: Exalted Reaction (Redemption).name: Efekt: Exalted Reaction (Redemption)
Effect: Exalted Reaction (Redemption).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.uptzvOLrZ3fctrl2]{Exalted Reaction}

You grant the resistance to yourself and all allies in your champion's aura, including the triggering ally. If you do, the resistance is reduced by 2 for all.

Effect: Exemplary Finisher (Rascal).name: Efekt: Exemplary Finisher (Rascal)
Effect: Exemplary Finisher (Rascal).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.KxpaxUSuBC7hr4F7]{Exemplary Finisher}

The foe takes a –10 circumstance penalty to its speed until the start of your next turn.

Effect: Exemplary Finisher (Wit).name: Efekt: Exemplary Finisher (Wit)
Effect: Exemplary Finisher (Wit).description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.KxpaxUSuBC7hr4F7]{Exemplary Finisher}

The foe takes a –2 circumstance penalty to attack rolls against you until the start of your next turn.

Effect: Expel Maelstrom (Failure or Crit.name: Efekt: Rozpędzenie Zawieruchy (Porażka lub Krytyczna Porażka)
Effect: Expel Maelstrom (Failure or Crit.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.IV8sgoLO6ShD3DCJ]{Rozpędzenie Zawieruchy}

Istota ponosi karę statusową –2 do wszystkich rzutów obronnych i testów umiejętności na 10 minut.

Effect: Expel Maelstrom (Misfortune).name: Efekt: Rozpędzenie Zawieruchy (Nieszczęście)
Effect: Expel Maelstrom (Misfortune).description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.IV8sgoLO6ShD3DCJ]{Rozpędzenie Zawieruchy}

Istota musi przy następnym rzucie obronnym lub teście umiejętności rzucić dwukrotnie i wybrać niższy wynik.

Effect: Expel Maelstrom (Success).name: Efekt: Rozpędzenie Zawieruchy (Sukces)
Effect: Expel Maelstrom (Success).description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.IV8sgoLO6ShD3DCJ]{Rozpędzenie Zawieruchy}

Istota ponosi karę statusową –1 do wszystkich rzutów obronnych i testów umiejętności na 1 minutę.

Effect: Extra Alchemy.name: Efekt: Dodatkowa Alchemia
Effect: Extra Alchemy.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.familiar-abilities.Item.ModT5b0jvnaitzJH]{Dodatkową Alchemię}

Możesz stworzyć z użyciem zaawansowanej alchemii jeden dodatkowy przedmiot.

Effect: Eye of the Arclords.name: Efekt: Oko Maglordów
Effect: Eye of the Arclords.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.OtV7esAwza1U6Kwr]{Oko Maglordów}.

Zyskujesz widzenie w ciemności oraz premię statusową +2 do testów Percepcji na rzecz Szukania niewykrytych i schowanych istot oraz do twojego ST Percepcji przeciw Przekradaniu Się i Chowaniu Się.

1.label: Oko Maglordów (Szukanie niewykrytych i schowanych istot)

Effect: Eye-Catching Spot.name: Efekt: Eye-Catching Spot
Effect: Eye-Catching Spot.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.Em5gwwyVHql9cSW2]{Eye-Catching Spot}

You have a –1 circumstance penalty to melee attack rolls against the exemplar.

Effect: Familiar of Balanced Luck.name: Efekt: Chowaniec Zrównoważonego Szczęścia
Effect: Familiar of Balanced Luck.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.familiar-abilities.Item.6ZmgkMHUGGb1mDhr]{Chowańca Zrównoważonego Szczęścia}

Zyskujesz albo premię statusową +1 do KP, albo karę statusową –1 do KP.

Effect: Familiar of Bolstering Aid.name: Efekt: Chowaniec Pokrzepiającego Wsparcia
Effect: Familiar of Bolstering Aid.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.familiar-abilities.Item.HNoR0D2sKQaDNh5Z]{Chowańca Pokrzepiającego Wsparcia}

Zyskujesz premię statusową +2 do następnego testu umiejętności niebędącego atakiem.

Effect: Familiar of Keen Senses.name: Efekt: Chowaniec Wyostrzonych Zmysłów
Effect: Familiar of Keen Senses.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.familiar-abilities.Item.onye3PN84lmca11D]{Chowańca Wyostrzonych Zmysłów}

Twój chowaniec zyskuje wybrany przez ciebie nieprecyzyjny zmysł węchu, wyczucia drgań lub wyczucia fal, o zasięgu 60 stóp.

Effect: Familiar of Restored Spirit.name: Efekt: Chowaniec Przywracanego Ducha
Effect: Familiar of Restored Spirit.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.familiar-abilities.Item.ZCze1FY3Rmnvd6Dx]{Chowańca Przywracanego Ducha}

Zyskujesz tymczasowe Punkty Żywotności równe 2 + połowa poziomu rzucającego.

Effect: Familiar's Resolve.name: Efekt: Familiar's Resolve
Effect: Familiar's Resolve.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.BQ50m0Jb9qyoPchi]{Familiar's Resolve}

You gain a status bonus to saving throws against effects that would cause you to be @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.3uh1r86TzbQvosxv]{Zgubiony} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Przerażony}.

Effect: Favorable Winds.name: Efekt: Favorable Winds
Effect: Favorable Winds.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.OK8Fm7EG8wjoYZBX]{Favorable Winds}

If your weapon has a range increment of 10 feet or less, increase its range increment by 10 feet for that Strike.

Effect: Favored Terrain (Gain Climb Spee.name: Efekt: Preferowany Teren (Zyskaj Prędkość Wspinaczki)
Effect: Favored Terrain (Gain Climb Spee.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.sgo7J9BVofBqwlsF]{Preferowany Teren (Górski, Leśny lub Podziemny)} jeśli posiadasz atrybut klasowy @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.RlwE99yKnhq8FUuy]{Niestrudzona Podróż} oraz znajdujesz się w terenie górskim, leśnym lub podziemnym i nie posiadasz jeszcze Prędkości wspinaczki.

Zyskujesz Prędkość wspinaczki równą twojej Prędkości.

Effect: Favored Terrain (Gain Swim Speed.name: Efekt: Preferowany Teren (Zyskaj Prędkość Pływania)
Effect: Favored Terrain (Gain Swim Speed.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.sgo7J9BVofBqwlsF]{Preferowany Teren (Wodny)} jeśli posiadasz atrybut klasowy @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.RlwE99yKnhq8FUuy]{Niestrudzona Podróż} oraz znajdujesz się terenie wodnym i nie posiadasz jeszcze Prędkości pływania.

Zyskujesz Prędkość pływania równą twojej Prędkości.

Effect: Favored Terrain (Increase Climb.name: Efekt: Preferowany Teren (Zwiększ Prędkość Wspinaczki)
Effect: Favored Terrain (Increase Climb.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.sgo7J9BVofBqwlsF]{Preferowany Teren (Górski, Leśny lub Podziemny)} jeśli posiadasz atrybut klasowy @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.RlwE99yKnhq8FUuy]{Niestrudzona Podróż} oraz znajdujesz się w terenie górskim, leśnym lub podziemnym i posiadasz już Prędkość wspinaczki.

Zyskujesz premię statusową +10 stóp do swojej Prędkości wspinaczki.

Effect: Favored Terrain (Increase Swim S.name: Efekt: Preferowany Teren (Zwiększ Prędkość Pływania)
Effect: Favored Terrain (Increase Swim S.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.sgo7J9BVofBqwlsF]{Preferowany Teren (Wodny)} jeśli posiadasz atrybut klasowy @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.RlwE99yKnhq8FUuy]{Niestrudzona Podróż} oraz znajdujesz się w terenie wodnym i posiadasz już Prędkość pływania.

Zyskujesz premię statusową +10 stóp do swojej Prędkości pływania.

Effect: Feral Swing.name: Efekt: Feral Swing
Effect: Feral Swing.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.K3hd3w20M707t6Iq]{Feral Swing}

You take a –2 circumstance penalty to your Reflex save.

Effect: Fey Blood Magic.name: Efekt: Fey Blood Magic
Effect: Fey Blood Magic.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.eW3cfCH7Wpx2vik2]{Bloodline: Fey}

You gain a +2 status bonus to Performance checks.

Effect: Field Discovery (Chirurgeon).name: Efekt: Field Discovery (Chirurgeon)
Effect: Field Discovery (Chirurgeon).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.eNZnx4LISDNftbx2]{Chirurgeon}

The creature gains a number of temporary Hit Points equal to your Intelligence modifier.

Effect: Fiendish Wings.name: Efekt: Fiendish Wings
Effect: Fiendish Wings.description: You can strain to call forth bat-like or otherwise fiendish wings from your back, similar in appearance to those of your fiendish ancestors. Once manifested, these wings remain for 10 minutes. You gain a fly Speed equal to your land Speed while you've manifested your wings.

Effect: Fish From the Falls' Edge.name: Efekt: Fish From the Falls' Edge
Effect: Fish From the Falls' Edge.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.tv0TX0DiDg2lDMOl]{Fish From the Falls' Edge}

You gain a +1 status bonus to your saving throws and AC.

Effect: Flamboyant Cruelty.name: Efekt: Flamboyant Cruelty
Effect: Flamboyant Cruelty.description:
Granted when you use @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.SAOtGk9k8veaX3Ww]{Flamboyant Cruelty}

When you make a melee weapon Strike against a foe that has at least two of the following conditions - Clumsy, Drained, Enfeebled, Frightened, Sickened, and Stupefied - you gain a circumstance bonus to your damage roll equal to the number of these conditions the foe has.

If you hit such a foe, you gain a +1 circumstance bonus to skill checks to Tumble Through and to perform your style's Panache-granting actions until the end of your turn.

Effect: Fleet Tempo.name: Efekt: Fleet Tempo
Effect: Fleet Tempo.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.SVdYJW5JsOMhAYd0]{Fleet Tempo}

You gain a +10-foot status bonus to all Speeds.

Effect: Fling Magic (Adept Cold).name: Efekt: Fling Magic (Adept Cold)
Effect: Fling Magic (Adept Cold).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.04VQuQih77pxX06q]{Fling Magic}

You take a –10-foot-status penalty to all Speeds.

Effect: Fluttering Distraction.name: Efekt: Fluttering Distraction
Effect: Fluttering Distraction.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.hOImeMiRPIRKPPXY]{Fluttering Distraction}

The enemy must roll its attack twice and take the lower result.

Effect: Fly on Shadowed Wings.name: Efekt: Fly on Shadowed Wings
Effect: Fly on Shadowed Wings.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.ekPCBxVAOugxpvUY]{Fly on Shadowed Wings}

You gain a fly Speed equal to your land Speed and resistance to precision damage equal to your level.

Effect: Force of Nature (Silver Damage).name: Efekt: Force of Nature (Silver Damage)
Effect: Force of Nature (Silver Damage).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.jIL0dobpVmCrmSj1]{Force of Nature}

Your fast healing deactivates.

Effect: Forcible Energy.name: Efekt: Forsująca Energia
Effect: Forcible Energy.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.UJafwv306v75Syy7]{Forsującą Energię}

Cel zyskuje podatność 5 na obrażenia od dźwięku, elektryczności, kwasu, ognia lub zimna.

Effect: Formation Training.name: Efekt: Formation Training
Effect: Formation Training.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.aoz9dCq2NynyUYEf]{Formation Training}

You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to AC and saving throws. This bonus increases to +2 on Reflex saves against area effects.

Effect: Fortify Shield.name: Efekt: Fortify Shield
Effect: Fortify Shield.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.DidzozerKLZ2UYLx]{Fortify Shield}

You Raise your Shield. Add your character level to your shield's Hardness.

Effect: Fresh Produce.name: Efekt: Fresh Produce
Effect: Fresh Produce.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.IcAEMf94XoTvtzAO]{Fresh Produce}

You gain resistance to void damage.

Effect: Fulminating Shot.name: Efekt: Fulminating Shot
Effect: Fulminating Shot.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.o3J79hnr00ztcwtT]{Fulminating Shot}

Choose acid, cold, electricity, or fire. If you hit with your next attack roll using a firearm or crossbow before the end of your turn, you deal 1k6 additional damage of this type. At 12. level, this increases to 2k6 additional damage, and at 18. level, it increases to 3k6 additional damage.

Effect: Fungal Rot.name: Efekt: Fungal Rot
Effect: Fungal Rot.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.ZYAn8X0IjA6i38qU]{Fungal Rot}

Mild Backlash You take damage equal to your level as your body decays.

Moderate Backlash You take damage equal to your level and become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Zemdlony 2}.

Severe Backlash You take damage equal to twice your level and become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Zemdlony 4}. You can't reduce the value of your sickened condition below 1 for 1 hour.

Effect: Furnace Form.name: Efekt: Furnace Form
Effect: Furnace Form.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.6vHkvQv0j56nZuR3]{Furnace Form}

You gain fire immunity, resistance 10 to precision damage, and weakness 5 to cold and to water. Your unarmed attacks deal 1k4 additional fire damage, and your fire spells deal one additional die of fire damage (of the same damage die the spell uses). Your fire Elemental Blasts deal an additional die of damage. In fire form, you have a fly Speed of 40 feet.

Effect: Game Hunter (Critical Failure).name: Efekt: Game Hunter (Krytyczna Porażka)
Effect: Game Hunter (Critical Failure).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.CowQy8gXP9POjuxq]{Game Hunter Dedication}

Your Speeds are each reduced by 10 feet.

Effect: Game Hunter (Failure).name: Efekt: Game Hunter (Porażka)
Effect: Game Hunter (Failure).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.CowQy8gXP9POjuxq]{Game Hunter Dedication}

Your Speeds are each reduced by 10 feet.

Effect: Gathering Moss.name: Efekt: Gathering Moss
Effect: Gathering Moss.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.yg02rHaDPpGSgkrk]{Gathering Moss}

You gain fast healing equal to your level.

Effect: Genie Blood Magic.name: Efekt: Genie Blood Magic
Effect: Genie Blood Magic.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.tYOMBiH3HbViNWwn]{Bloodline: Genie}

Either you gain a +1 status bonus to Deception checks for 1 round, or a target takes a –1 status penalty to Perception for 1 round.

Effect: Geobukseon Retaliation.name: Efekt: Geobukseon Retaliation
Effect: Geobukseon Retaliation.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.WcvscJpQhbTiefwn]{Geobukseon Retaliation}

You gain a +4 circumstance bonus to AC and resistance 2 to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage.

Effect: Ghost Strike.name: Efekt: Ghost Strike
Effect: Ghost Strike.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.pM0g4ColXTiQ3gTa]{Ghost Strike}

The weapon gains the effects of the ghost touch property rune. At 10. level, you can apply this effect to two weapons instead of one.

Effect: Ghost Wrangler.name: Efekt: Ghost Wrangler
Effect: Ghost Wrangler.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.00OnDt8UEMwfoYWH]{Ghost Wrangler}

Your fists gain the effects of the ghost touch property rune.

Effect: Ghosts in the Storm.name: Efekt: Ghosts in the Storm
Effect: Ghosts in the Storm.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feat-effects.Item.sPIaly8bgNxgcNvT]{Postawa: Ghosts in the Storm}

You gain a +2 status bonus to Reflex saves and Acrobatics checks.

Effect: Ghosts in the Storm (Move).name: Efekt: Ghosts in the Storm (Move)
Effect: Ghosts in the Storm (Move).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.ABL4daQ7c65d0tEM]{Ghosts in the Storm}

You are concealed, and your Strikes gain the shock rune.

Effect: Giant's Lunge.name: Efekt: Giant's Lunge
Effect: Giant's Lunge.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.MFqFvuiYDAoADcft]{Giant's Lunge}

All your melee weapons and unarmed attacks gain reach 10.

Effect: Giant's Stature.name: Efekt: Giant's Stature
Effect: Giant's Stature.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.W21jKAcG0GtEtBiK]{Giant's Stature}

You become Large, increasing your reach by 5 feet and gaining the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Niezdarny 1} condition until you stop raging

Effect: Gird Champion (Hierophant).name: Efekt: Gird Champion (Hierophant)
Effect: Gird Champion (Hierophant).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.pGIJ6iXyg2CRzQxb]{Gird Champion}

You treat the origin's favored weapon as a simple weapon for the purposes of proficiency, you gain the critical specialization effect of that weapon and deal 1k6 additional damage with Strikes made with it.

Effect: Glimpses to Beyond.name: Efekt: Glimpses to Beyond
Effect: Glimpses to Beyond.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.adventure-specific-actions.Item.8CZwqRQ1w8OaAtO7]{(Affinity Ablaze) Biting Roses: Glimpses to Beyond}

You gain spiritsense as a precise sense with a range of 60 feet.

Effect: Goading Feint.name: Efekt: Goading Feint
Effect: Goading Feint.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.hXYnwpi95E77qfAu]{Goading Feint}

You take a –2 circumstance penalty to attack rolls against the opponent.

Effect: Goblin Song (Critical Success).name: Efekt: Goblin Song (Krytyczny Sukces)
Effect: Goblin Song (Critical Success).description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.QZb0Utg0WFPf2Qg0]{Goblin Song}

Istota ponosi karę statusową –1 do testów Percepcji i rzutów obronnych Woli.

Effect: Goblin Song (Success).name: Efekt: Goblin Song (Sukces)
Effect: Goblin Song (Success).description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.QZb0Utg0WFPf2Qg0]{Goblin Song}

Istota ponosi karę statusową –1 do testów Percepcji i rzutów obronnych Woli.

Effect: God's Palm (Temporary Hit Points.name: Efekt: God's Palm (Temporary Hit Points)
Effect: God's Palm (Temporary Hit Points.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.ZuKEEP4S4b4fbgAt]{Gods' Palm}

You gain temporary Hit Points equal to half your level.

Effect: Godspeed.name: Efekt: Godspeed
Effect: Godspeed.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Mw4owPxaU6i2Dpgl]{Godspeed}

You gain a +10-foot status bonus to all your Speeds and are Quickened.

Effect: Great Tengu Form.name: Efekt: Great Tengu Form
Effect: Great Tengu Form.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.ABXUfGoeBgCyFasg]{Great Tengu Form}

You also gain the benefits of 4. kręgu @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.wzctak6BxOW8xvFV]{Powiększenie} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.A2JfEKe6BZcTG1S8]{Fly} spells.

Effect: Guardian's Deflection.name: Efekt: Guardian's Deflection
Effect: Guardian's Deflection.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.JdCRxwgtdQkJ1Ha6]{Guardian's Deflection (Fighter)} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.YJIzE2RhGRGfbt9j]{Guardian's Deflection (Swashbuckler)}.

You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to AC against the triggering attack.

Effect: Guardian's Embrace.name: Efekt: Guardian's Embrace
Effect: Guardian's Embrace.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.fJxIdcg7kWPwlULY]{Guardian's Embrace}

You gain a +2 status bonus to AC against physical attacks and can use a reaction to gain resistance 10 to physical damage dealt by that attack, which ends this effect.

Effect: Guide the Timeline.name: Efekt: Guide the Timeline
Effect: Guide the Timeline.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Ek1CoyGKxsozDsaD]{Guide the Timeline}

If you are an ally, the next time you make an attack roll or skill check, roll it twice and take the higher result. If you are a foe, the next time you make an attack roll or skill check, you must roll twice and take the lower result.

Effect: Guided Skill.name: Efekt: Guided Skill
Effect: Guided Skill.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.x7EGJYZQuxHbP50X]{Guided Skill}

You gain a +2 status bonus to checks made using Acrobatics, Occultism, Stealth, or Survival.

Effect: Guided by the Stars.name: Efekt: Guided by the Stars
Effect: Guided by the Stars.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.s1swBWSqtfrXTJHK]{Guided by the Stars}

You roll twice and take the better result on your next skill check or saving throw. If it's night and you can see the stars, you gain a +1 circumstance bonus to the triggering roll.

Effect: Guiding Words.name: Efekt: Guiding Words
Effect: Guiding Words.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.LmsjuqB3rrZTqqa6]{Guiding Words}

Roll twice and use the better result on your first attack roll.

Effect: Gunpowder Gauntlet.name: Efekt: Gunpowder Gauntlet
Effect: Gunpowder Gauntlet.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.FbzbZc4LGUTcz9tA]{Gunpowder Gauntlet}

You take a penalty to attack rolls against creatures other than the origin.

Effect: Hag Blood Magic.name: Efekt: Hag Blood Magic
Effect: Hag Blood Magic.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.O0uXZRWMNliDbkxU]{Bloodline: Hag}

You gain temporary Hit Points equal to the spell's rank.

Effect: Hamstringing Strike.name: Efekt: Cios Pod Kolana
Effect: Hamstringing Strike.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.s2GbcUIXG1ZBurSd]{Cios Pod Kolana}

Ponosisz karę statusową –5 stóp do swojej Prędkości. Przy krytycznym trafieniu, ponosisz karę statusową –10 stóp do swojej Prędkości.

Effect: Harbinger's Armament.name: Efekt: Harbinger's Armament
Effect: Harbinger's Armament.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.KuLH3nG3chToIffB]{Harbinger's Armament}

Select one weapon or handwraps of mighty blows. It gains the effect of one property rune. Choose either fearsome, ghost touch, returning, shifting, or vitalizing.

If you have @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Z91dIlVcJXoicbHj]{Greater Armament}, add brilliant, corrosive, flaming, frost, holy, shock, thundering, and unholy.

Effect: Harden Flesh.name: Efekt: Harden Flesh
Effect: Harden Flesh.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.REgTwIVgI3j1FQiJ]{Harden Flesh}

You gain resistance 3 to physical damage, except adamantine, until the beginning of your next turn.

Effect: Harrow Omen.name: Efekt: Harrow Omen
Effect: Harrow Omen.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.0i4zOM1p0rFxnc5m]{Harrower Dedication}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.JoZRbbexF3epeREe]{Benevolent Spirit Deck}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.nqEqvZviKYuGVxLV]{Restore Omen}

Draw a card from your harrow deck — that card's suit becomes your active harrow omen.

Effect: Harrow the Fiend.name: Efekt: Harrow the Fiend
Effect: Harrow the Fiend.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.EuoCFSHTzi0VOfuf]{Harrow the Fiend}

You gain a +1 status bonus on all Strikes or spell attack rolls against fiends.

Effect: Harrow-Chosen.name: Efekt: Harrow-Chosen
Effect: Harrow-Chosen.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.backgrounds.Item.X1YhwDic2ugT9RuQ]{Harrow-Chosen}

This benefit is determined by alignment of the card you draw from the deck. The card can match both alignment components with yours (true match), match a single alignment component with yours (partial match), have no matching alignment components (unmatched), or have a diametrically opposed alignment to yours (misaligned).

True match: You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to a saving throw of your choice (Fortitude, Reflex, or Will) for 1 minute.

Partial match: You gain resistance to one energy type (acid, cold, electricity, fire, or sonic) equal to your level for 1 minute.

Unmatched: You gain temporary Hit Points equal to twice your level. The temporary Hit Points remain for 1 minute.

Misaligned: You gain a +5-foot circumstance bonus to your Speeds for 1 minute.

Effect: Harsh Judgement.name: Efekt: Harsh Judgement
Effect: Harsh Judgement.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.37uOb0iaWCfTCvBZ]{Harsh Judgement}

You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to Perception checks to Seek your condemned foe and on Intimidation checks to Demoralize them. You have a –1 circumstance penalty to Perception checks to Seek creatures other than your condemned foe and on Intimidation checks to Demoralize anyone other than your condemned foe.

Effect: Harvest Blood.name: Efekt: Harvest Blood
Effect: Harvest Blood.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.GrzbczH9S3SHPiIQ]{Harvest Blood}

You gain temporary Hit Points equal to your Constitution modifier, and gain a +1 circumstance bonus to saving throws against that creature's spells.

Effect: Hasty Celebration.name: Efekt: Hasty Celebration
Effect: Hasty Celebration.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Rb3ndqSyDUa6KvOL]{Hasty Celebration}

You grant all allies within 60 feet a +2 circumstance bonus to attack rolls and damage, and you're @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Opuszczona Garda} to all enemies.

Effect: Healer of the World.name: Efekt: Healer of the World
Effect: Healer of the World.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.xSgUH97WkWadielz]{Healer of the World}

You gain 10 temporary Hit Points.

Effect: Healing Sanctuary.name: Efekt: Healing Sanctuary
Effect: Healing Sanctuary.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.cD5EsurWVYekIXkz]{Healing Sanctuary}

You gain 10 temporary Hit Points.

Effect: Heaven's Thunder.name: Efekt: Heaven's Thunder
Effect: Heaven's Thunder.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.qJdbK8vgIqeHU7bu]{Heaven's Thunder}

Your unarmed attacks and any monk weapons you wield deal additional electricity and sonic damage; the amount of each damage type is equal to the number of damage dice for the weapon or unarmed attack.

If you also know the qi blast qi spell, you can choose to deal either electricity or sonic damage with the spell instead of force (qi blast loses the force trait and gains the electricity or sonic trait instead).

Effect: Helpful Tinkering.name: Efekt: Helpful Tinkering
Effect: Helpful Tinkering.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.qUSWPWxYF8gfhfHM]{Helpful Tinkering}

Your strikes with the chosen weapon gain the same offensive boost your inventor ally's innovation has.

Effect: Herald's Weapon.name: Efekt: Herald's Weapon
Effect: Herald's Weapon.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.5ELeiNtEDgXfBcwt]{Herald's Weapon}

Your chosen weapon or unarmed attack deals spirit damage instead of its regular damage, it gains the sanctified trait, and deals an additional 2k4 spirit damage.

Effect: Heroes' Call.name: Efekt: Heroes' Call
Effect: Heroes' Call.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.7cM7uKRKQDWz5eeu]{Heroes' Call}

You gain temporary Hit Points equal to twice your level.

Effect: Heroic Defiance.name: Efekt: Heroic Defiance
Effect: Heroic Defiance.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.81jVmGF9Uo9dp2dI]{Heroic Defiance}

You gain temporary Hit Points equal to your level and a +1 status bonus to all saving throws.

Effect: Heroic Recovery.name: Efekt: Heroic Recovery
Effect: Heroic Recovery.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.KR78kinMmAZQHeoa]{Heroic Recovery}

You gain a +5-foot status bonus to your Speed, and a +1 status bonus to attack and damage rolls.

Effect: High-Speed Regeneration Speed Bo.name: Efekt: High-Speed Regeneration Speed Boost
Effect: High-Speed Regeneration Speed Bo.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.xDTjr415ZZM8x2WW]{High-Speed Regeneration}

You gain a +10-foot status bonus to your Speed.

Effect: Hone Claws.name: Efekt: Hone Claws
Effect: Hone Claws.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.GU3EQVOMjD9S2YWj]{Hone Claws}

Your claws deal an additional 1k6 bleed damage.

Effect: Hopeful Athamaru.name: Efekt: Hopeful Athamaru
Effect: Hopeful Athamaru.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.heritages.Item.yEQSw61sNRvgPy4T]{Hopeful Athamaru}

You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to saving throws against fear.

Effect: Hot Foot (Critical Success).name: Efekt: Hot Foot (Krytyczny Sukces)
Effect: Hot Foot (Critical Success).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.dtPXuS8MiWrz5UNK]{Hot Foot}

You are off-guard and take a –2 circumstance penalty to Reflex saves.

Effect: Howling Aspect.name: Efekt: Howling Aspect
Effect: Howling Aspect.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.rb0GCneYEzBi2LGr]{Howling Aspect}

You gain a tusks melee unarmed attack that deals 1k6 piercing damage, is in the brawling group, and has the finesse and unarmed traits. You also gain a flame-hair melee unarmed attack that deals 1k4 fire damage, is in the brawling group, and has the agile, finesse, and unarmed traits.

Effect: Hungry Goblin.name: Efekt: Hungry Goblin
Effect: Hungry Goblin.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.DnfVQGLk3PAl8UWh]{Hungry Goblin}

You gain temporary Hit Points equal to half your level.

Effect: Hunt Prey.name: Efekt: Hunt Prey
Effect: Hunt Prey.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.JYi4MnsdFu618hPm]{Hunt Prey}

You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to Perception checks when you @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.BlAOM2X92SI6HMtJ]{Seek} your prey and a +2 circumstance bonus to Survival checks when you @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.EA5vuSgJfiHH7plD]{Track} your prey. You also ignore the penalty for making ranged attacks within your second range increment against the prey you're hunting.

You can have only one creature designated as your prey at a time. If you use Hunt Prey against a creature when you already have a creature designated, the prior creature loses the designation and the new prey gains the designation. Your designation lasts until your next daily preparations.

Effect: Hunt the Razer's Pawn.name: Efekt: Hunt the Razer's Pawn
Effect: Hunt the Razer's Pawn.description: You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to Perception checks to Seek or Sense the Motive of the marked creature. This creature takes a –1 circumstance penalty to saving throws against spells or effects you create. This penalty increases to –2 against effects that have the holy trait.

Effect: Hunt the Razer's Pawn (Ephemeral.name: Efekt: Hunt the Razer's Pawn (Ephemeral)
Effect: Hunt the Razer's Pawn (Ephemeral.description:
Ephemeral effect for

You take a a –1 circumstance penalty to saving throws against spells or effects created by the originating actor. This penalty increases to –2 against effects that have the holy trait.

Effect: Hunter's Edge, Flurry.name: Efekt: Przewaga Łowcy, Salwa
Effect: Hunter's Edge, Flurry.description:
Przyznawane kiedy łowca podzieli się z tobą swoją przewagą @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.6v4Rj7wWfOH1882r]{Salwa}.

Przeciw twojej łowionej zwierzynie twoja kara za atak wielokrotny wynosi –3 (–2 dla broni chyżej) przy twoim drugim ataku zamiast –5, oraz –6 (–4 dla broni chyżej) przy twoim trzecim ataku w danej turze zamiast –10.

Effect: Hunter's Edge, Outwit.name: Efekt: Przewaga Łowcy, Spryt
Effect: Hunter's Edge, Outwit.description:
Przyznawane kiedy łowca podzieli się z tobą swoją przewagą @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.NBHyoTrI8q62uDsU]{Sprytu}.

Zyskujesz premię sytuacyjną +1 do swojej KP przeciw atakom swojej zwierzyny oraz premię sytuacyjną +2 do testów Oszukiwania, Skradania się i Zastraszania oraz dowolnych testów wykonywanych aby Pozyskać Wiedzę o swojej zwierzynie.

Effect: Hunter's Edge, Precision.name: Efekt: Przewaga Łowcy, Precyzja
Effect: Hunter's Edge, Precision.description:
Przyznawane kiedy łowca podzieli się z tobą swoją przewagą @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.u6cBjqz2fiRBadBt]{Precyzji}.

Za pierwszym razem kiedy trafisz swoją łowioną zwierzynę w danej rundzie, zadajesz dodatkowo 1k8 obrażeń precyzyjnych.

Na poziomie 11. dodatkowe obrażenia zwiększają się do 2k8 obrażeń precyzyjnych a na poziomie 19. dodatkowe obrażenia zwiększają się do 3k8 obrażeń precyzyjnych.

Effect: Hybrid Shape (Beastkin).name: Efekt: Postać Hybrydowa (Bestioludź)
Effect: Hybrid Shape (Beastkin).description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.34E7k2YRcsOU5uyl]{Zmianę Kształtu}.

W postaci hybrydowej zyskujesz wygląd będący mieszanką cech wynikających z twojego przodkostwa oraz twojego wrodzonego zwierzęcia. W postaci hybrydowej zyskujesz Ciosy wręcz oraz szczękami odpowiednie dla twojego wrodzonego zwierzęcia (kły dla nietoperzy, dziób dla orłów, żuwaczki dla os i tak dalej). Twoje szczeki zadają 1k4 obrażeń kłutych, mają cechy chyżość, finezyjność oraz wręcz i należą do grupy broni ręcznych.

Effect: Hydraulic Deflection.name: Efekt: Hydraulic Deflection
Effect: Hydraulic Deflection.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.kqRFoXfErUFEndIs]{Hydraulic Deflection}

You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to AC.

Effect: Imperial Blood Magic.name: Efekt: Imperial Blood Magic
Effect: Imperial Blood Magic.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.ZEtJJ5UOlV5oTWWp]{Bloodline: Imperial}

You gain your choice of either a +1 status bonus to AC or a +1 status bonus to saving throws.

Effect: Improved Poison Weapon.name: Efekt: Improved Poison Weapon
Effect: Improved Poison Weapon.description: Applied when you apply a poison created with @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.9Eufa07qvXG41QmG]{Improved Poison Weapon}.

Effect: In Lightning, Life.name: Efekt: In Lightning, Life
Effect: In Lightning, Life.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.1RQLf09kpOO6ljmb]{In Lightning, Life}

You gain temporary hit points.

Effect: Indomitable Spirit.name: Efekt: Indomitable Spirit
Effect: Indomitable Spirit.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.v84501yLBubHlGPz]{Indomitable Spirit}

You get a +4 circumstance bonus to AC and are quickened. The additional action can be used to Strike or Stride.

Effect: Inertial Barrier.name: Efekt: Inertial Barrier
Effect: Inertial Barrier.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Nm4yeoJVXRy0Wyth]{Inertial Barrier}

You or one target of the spell gains resistance to physical damage equal to 2 + the spell's rank until the start of your next turn.

Effect: Infused with Belkzen's Might.name: Efekt: Infused with Belkzen's Might
Effect: Infused with Belkzen's Might.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.DaRfJsWAivah3a07]{Infused with Belkzen's Might}

You deal additional spirit damage with weapons and unarmed attacks equal to 1 plus half the number of Tattooed Historian feats you have.

Effect: Inspired Stratagem.name: Efekt: Inspired Stratagem
Effect: Inspired Stratagem.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.ZXvJGxMJc0HRpcQh]{Inspired Stratagem}

You roll the triggering check twice and take the better of the two results.

Effect: Inspiring Marshal Stance.name: Efekt: Inspiring Marshal Stance
Effect: Inspiring Marshal Stance.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.bvOsJNeI0ewvQsFa]{Inspiring Marshal Stance}

You gain a +1 status bonus to attack rolls and saves against mental effects.

Effect: Inspiring Resilience.name: Efekt: Inspiring Resilience
Effect: Inspiring Resilience.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.AbsqV1P8OAhChcRl]{Inspiring Resilience}

You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to your Will save against the triggering effect, or a +2 circumstance bonus if the effect originated from an undead.

Effect: Instructive Strike.name: Efekt: Instructive Strike
Effect: Instructive Strike.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.6TlBZSPr18Y8WiNk]{Instructive Strike}

You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to your check to Recall Knowledge.

Effect: Inventive Offensive.name: Efekt: Inventive Offensive
Effect: Inventive Offensive.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.SrSYEHqOLXWuj65e]{Inventive Offensive}

When you use this ability, add one of the following weapon traits to a melee weapon you wield: deadly k6, disarm, nonlethal, shove, trip, versatile B, versatile P, or versatile S. You cannot add a trait that the weapon already has. The weapon retains this trait until you a successfully hit and deal damage with the weapon. The weapon retains this trait only while you wield it, and you can have only one weapon modified in this way at any time.

If you have legendary proficiency in Crafting, you can apply two weapon traits from the list when using this feat.

Effect: Invigorating Breath.name: Efekt: Invigorating Breath
Effect: Invigorating Breath.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.23QgyEYjoslBvkra]{Invigorating Breath}

You gain 20 temporary Hit Points. At 15th level, you instead gain 30 temporary Hit Points.

Effect: Invigorating Surge.name: Efekt: Invigorating Surge
Effect: Invigorating Surge.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.mMboqxWsQmwUTQ6m]{Invigorating Surge}

You gain temporary Hit Points.

Effect: Invoke Defense.name: Efekt: Invoke Defense
Effect: Invoke Defense.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.iBdvNOWazhiXeUUa]{Invoke Defense}

Choose bludgeoning, piercing, or slashing. You gain resistance equal to half your level to that damage type.

Effect: Invoke Movement.name: Efekt: Invoke Movement
Effect: Invoke Movement.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.7ZYw4SiBLBbbICNs]{Invoke Movement}

You gain a burrow, climb, fly or swim speed.

Effect: Invoke Offense.name: Efekt: Invoke Offense
Effect: Invoke Offense.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.EEtezGRTZSHayQDR]{Invoke Offense}

You gain an unarmed attack that deals 1k8 spirit damage for the duration of your spirit trance.This unarmed attack is in the brawling weapon group and has the agile, finesse, and magical traits.

At 5th level, this unarmed attack gains the benefits of a striking rune. At 12th level, this unarmed attack gains the benefits of a greater striking rune. At 20th level, this unarmed attack gains the benefits of a major striking rune.

Effect: Juvenile Flight.name: Efekt: Juvenile Flight
Effect: Juvenile Flight.description:
You gain a fly Speed equal to your land Speed while your wings are unfurled.

If you have @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.UuVz1QY7QXD5cnLu]{Fledgling Flight}, you gain a +10-foot status bonus to your fly Speed with Juvenile Flight. As normal, since your fly Speed is derived from your land Speed, this status bonus isn't cumulative with a status bonus to your land Speed, if you have one.

Effect: Kindle Inner Flames.name: Efekt: Kindle Inner Flames
Effect: Kindle Inner Flames.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.ySeT8hrMEPF9AsQu]{Kindle Inner Flames}

You gain a status bonus to Reflex saves and Acrobatics checks.

Effect: Kindling.name: Efekt: Żagiew
Effect: Kindling.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.familiar-abilities.Item.gVPtUSEPZYGRIRyQ]{Żagiew}

Zyskujesz premię statusową do obrażeń zaklęcia posiadającego cechę ogień, równą podwojonemu kręgowi tego zaklęcia.

Effect: Kishin Rage.name: Efekt: Kishin Rage
Effect: Kishin Rage.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.zknpo51jJndv68Ph]{Kishin Rage}

You gain 40 temporary Hit Points, a fly Speed equal to your Speed, and your horns deal an additional 1k4 electricity damage.

Effect: Kneecap.name: Efekt: Kneecap
Effect: Kneecap.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.1muxLx8Vacn2SLHc]{Kneecap}

The target takes a status penalty to its Speed.

Effect: Known Weakness.name: Efekt: Znana Słabość
Effect: Known Weakness.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.iWvpq3uDZcXvBJj8]{Znane Słabości}.

Zyskujesz premię sytuacyjną +1 do następnego rzutu ataku przeciwko celowi obmyślonej strategii, tak długo jak atak ten zostanie wykonany przed początkiem następnej tury śledczego.

Effect: Lantern.name: Efekt: Lantern
Effect: Lantern.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.AltwHU7hCqTwpn48]{Lantern}

You gain gain a +1 status bonus to visual Perception checks to notice anything that is within the origin's bright light, and to checks to Recall Knowledge against creatures within the bright light.

Effect: Lava Leap.name: Efekt: Lava Leap
Effect: Lava Leap.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.OFCeTaAX99YbXOu0]{Lava Leap}

You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to AC.

Effect: Leech-Clip.name: Efekt: Leech-Clip
Effect: Leech-Clip.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.OZtoTusMmCJymObT]{Leech-Clip}

You take a –10-foot status penalty to your Speed (or a –15-foot status penalty on a critical hit).

Effect: Left-Hand Blood.name: Efekt: Left-Hand Blood
Effect: Left-Hand Blood.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.7XA3Hm2md2tU9pEz]{Left-Hand Blood}

If you hit with the weapon and deal damage, the target also takes 1k4 persistent poison damage.

Effect: Legendary Monster.name: Efekt: Legendary Monster
Effect: Legendary Monster.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.DmpJgLsHfv1kMcJc]{Legendary Monster}

When you Unleash Yaoguai Might, you can gain one of the following additional benefits.

  • Your body grows to impossible heights. Your @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.wzctak6BxOW8xvFV]{Powiększenie} effect is heightened to 4th rank.
  • Your spiritual power erupts to punish your enemies. You deal an additional 1k4 spirit damage with all Strikes and attack spells, and your Strikes and attack spells gain the spirit trait.
  • You can leap off the air itself. You gain the effects of the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.A2JfEKe6BZcTG1S8]{Fly} spell.

Effect: Legendary Monster Hunter.name: Efekt: Legendary Monster Hunter
Effect: Legendary Monster Hunter.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.YTTJqRKH8QZl6al2]{Monster Hunter} if you have @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Veyt4x2Kb5YcPGTv]{Legendary Monster Hunter}.

You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to your next attack roll against that prey.

0.label: Target is the subject of Monster Hunter

Effect: Legendary Monster Warden.name: Efekt: Legendary Monster Warden
Effect: Legendary Monster Warden.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.2yq3l8e2Vzz34yRV]{Monster Warden} if you have @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Veyt4x2Kb5YcPGTv]{Legendary Monster Hunter}.

You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to your next attack roll against that prey.

You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to your next saving throw against that particular creature and to your AC against that creature's next attack against you.

0.label: Target is the subject of Monster Hunter

Effect: Liberating Step (vs. Aberration).name: Efekt: Liberating Step (vs. Aberration)
Effect: Liberating Step (vs. Aberration).description:
Granted by Esoteric Oath (Liberator)

If you use Liberating Step triggered by an evil aberration, your ally gains a +4 circumstance bonus to checks granted by your Liberating Step, and the ally can Step twice afterward.

Effect: Liberating Step (vs. Dragon).name: Efekt: Liberating Step (vs. Dragon)
Effect: Liberating Step (vs. Dragon).description:
Granted by Dragonslayer Oath (Liberator)

If you use Liberating Step triggered by an evil dragon, your ally gains a +4 circumstance bonus to checks granted by your Liberating Step, and the ally can Step twice afterward.

Effect: Liberating Step (vs. Fiend).name: Efekt: Liberating Step (vs. Fiend)
Effect: Liberating Step (vs. Fiend).description:
Granted by Fiendsbane Oath (Liberator)

If you use Liberating Step triggered by a fiend, your ally gains a +4 circumstance bonus to checks granted by your Liberating Step, and the ally can Step twice afterward.

Effect: Liberating Step (vs. Undead).name: Efekt: Liberating Step (vs. Undead)
Effect: Liberating Step (vs. Undead).description:
Granted by Shining Oath (Liberator)

If you use Liberating Step triggered by an undead, your ally gains a +4 circumstance bonus to checks granted by your Liberating Step, and the ally can Step twice afterward.

Effect: Life-Draining.name: Efekt: Life-Draining
Effect: Life-Draining.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.XIk9Z4cLsoJRyV0T]{Life-Draining}

Mild Backlash You become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Wyniszczony 1} as the plants feed off your life force. This condition lasts until you spend 3 consecutive actions to rest and do nothing.

Moderate Backlash You become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Wyniszczony 2} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.HL2l2VRSaQHu9lUw]{Wyczerpany} until you spend 20 minutes recuperating by resting and doing nothing. If you spend this time basking in sunshine, it instead takes 10 minutes.

Severe Backlash You become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Wyniszczony 3} until you spend 2 hours napping. While napping, you're @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fBnFDH2MTzgFijKf]{Nieprzytomny} and can't take actions or engage in exploration activities, but a creature can wake you with a single action with the manipulate trait. If you spend this time napping in natural sunlight, it instead takes 1 hour. You're fatigued until you can get a full night's rest.

Effect: Life-Giving Magic.name: Efekt: Life-Giving Magic
Effect: Life-Giving Magic.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.hSzNtRNwrma81Eeq]{Life-Giving Magic}

You gain a number of temporary Hit Points equal to half your level (minimum 1) that last until the end of your next turn.

Effect: Lightning Armillary.name: Efekt: Lightning Armillary
Effect: Lightning Armillary.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.familiar-abilities.Item.zwWgHjcU0iZ6gUDY]{Lightning Armillary}

Your weapon or hand deals an additional 1k6 electricity damage, or 1k8 electricity damage.

Effect: Living Epic.name: Efekt: Living Epic
Effect: Living Epic.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.NKsNDA8rS9R5MmAX]{Living Epic}

You gain a +1 status bonus to attack rolls, Perception, saving throws, and skill checks.

Effect: Living Fortification.name: Efekt: Living Fortification
Effect: Living Fortification.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.9MJcQEMVVrmMyGyq]{Living Fortification}

Zyskujesz premię sytuacyjną +1 do KP do początku swojej następnej tury.

Effect: Living Fortification (Parry Trai.name: Efekt: Living Fortification (Parry Trait)
Effect: Living Fortification (Parry Trai.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.9MJcQEMVVrmMyGyq]{Living Fortification}

Zyskujesz premię sytuacyjną +2 do KP do początku swojej następnej tury.

Effect: Living for the Applause.name: Efekt: Living for the Applause
Effect: Living for the Applause.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.CL43gGiErw5FUtFQ]{Living for the Applause}

You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to AC.

Effect: Lock On.name: Efekt: Lock On
Effect: Lock On.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.McnLGEZnUbtYCNDW]{Lock On}

You gain a circumstance bonus to attack rolls against the designated enemy.

Effect: Lord of the Fiends.name: Efekt: Lord of the Fiends
Effect: Lord of the Fiends.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.apz0n3Q3gWvQVChT]{Lord of the Fiends}

Whenever you roll a success on a Deception, Diplomacy, or Intimidation check against a fiend, you get a critical success instead.

Effect: Lost in the Crowd.name: Efekt: Lost in the Crowd
Effect: Lost in the Crowd.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.d8RfatiK9UOQANLz]{Lost in the Crowd}

You gain a +2 circumstance bonus on your Stealth check when in a crowd of at least 10 creatures or a +4 circumstance bonus when in a crowd of at least 100 creatures.

Effect: Maiden's Mending.name: Efekt: Maiden's Mending
Effect: Maiden's Mending.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Hmgy0GJKIawAiqHE]{Maiden's Mending}

You gain a number of temporary Hit Points equal to half your level (minimum 1) that last until the end of your next turn.

Effect: Manifest Realm.name: Efekt: Manifest Realm
Effect: Manifest Realm.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.IfWF56KiSFQbNmHj]{Manifest Realm}

You take a –1 penalty to Fortitude saving throws.

Effect: Marked for Rebuke.name: Efekt: Marked for Rebuke
Effect: Marked for Rebuke.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.k8c0E7YyeIQJjRzB]{Marked for Rebuke}

You gain weakness 10 to all damage.

Effect: Marshal's Aura.name: Efekt: Marshal's Aura
Effect: Marshal's Aura.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.MYzRfNExDYp25rro]{Marshal Dedication}

You gain a +1 status bonus to saving throws against fear.

Effect: Masterful Hunter's Edge, Flurry.name: Efekt: Masterful Hunter's Edge, Flurry
Effect: Masterful Hunter's Edge, Flurry.description:
Granted when a ranger shares their @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.JhLncIB10GSQowWL]{Masterful Hunter (Flurry)} with you.

Your multiple attack penalty for attacks against your hunted prey is –3 (-2 with an agile weapon) on your second attack of the turn instead of –5, and –6 (-4 with an agile weapon) on your third or subsequent attack of the turn, instead of –10.

Effect: Masterful Hunter's Edge, Outwit.name: Efekt: Masterful Hunter's Edge, Outwit
Effect: Masterful Hunter's Edge, Outwit.description:
Granted when a ranger shares their @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.vWZaLE2fEKMBw3D5]{Masterful Hunter (Outwit)} with you.

Your mastery of skills allows you to overwhelm your prey. If you have master proficiency in Deception, Intimidation, Stealth, or the skill you use to Recall Knowledge about your prey, increase the circumstance bonus against the prey with that skill from +2 to +4.

If you have master proficiency with your armor, increase the circumstance bonus to AC against the prey from +1 to +2.

4.label: Vs. attacks from hunted prey (Masterful Hunter)

8.label: Recall knowledge on hunted prey (Masterful Hunter)

9.label: Recall knowledge on hunted prey (Masterful Hunter)

10.label: Recall knowledge on hunted prey (Masterful Hunter)

11.label: Recall knowledge on hunted prey (Masterful Hunter)

12.label: Recall knowledge on hunted prey (Masterful Hunter)

13.label: Recall knowledge on hunted prey (Masterful Hunter)

Effect: Masterful Hunter's Edge, Precisi.name: Efekt: Masterful Hunter's Edge, Precision
Effect: Masterful Hunter's Edge, Precisi.description:
Granted when a ranger shares their @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.BJYSUbFUGcTLaPDn]{Masterful Hunter (Precision)} with you.

The second time in a round you hit your hunted prey, you also deal 1k8 precision damage.

At 19. level, your second hit in a round against your hunted prey deals 2k8 precision damage, and your third hit in a round against your hunted prey deals 1k8 precision damage.

4.label: Second attack on hunted prey this round

6.label: Third attack on hunted prey this round

Effect: Meddling Futures.name: Efekt: Meddling Futures
Effect: Meddling Futures.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.y8l4omYxEWH7vihP]{Meddling Futures}

Roll 1k4 to see what type of spirit is drawn to you. You gain the listed benefit for the action. If you attempt to use a different action, you must succeed at a @Check[flat|dc:6] or the action is lost.

1 Warrior You must attempt a Strike. You gain a +1 status bonus to your attack roll and a +2 status bonus to damage, or a +6 status bonus to damage if you are at least cursebound 3.

2 Adept You must attempt a Perception check or a skill action. You gain a +1 status bonus to the check, or a +2 status bonus if you are cursebound 3.

3 Sage You must attempt to Cast a Spell. You gain a status bonus to the spell's damage or healing equal to the spell's rank, or equal to the spell's rank + 3 if you are at least cursebound 3.

4 Wanderer You must attempt a Stride action, or a Fly, Climb, or Burrow action if you have the relevant speed. You gain a +10-foot status bonus to your Speed for the action, or a +20-foot status bonus if you are at least cursebound 3.

Effect: Memory of Skill.name: Efekt: Memory of Skill
Effect: Memory of Skill.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.7UDWeLq8OAL04gHR]{Memory of Skill}

You temporarily increase your proficiency rank with that skill by one step.

Effect: Mental Balm.name: Efekt: Mental Balm
Effect: Mental Balm.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.pEFcWRYiWLSjxvkW]{Mental Balm}

You or one ally within 30 feet gains a +2 status bonus to Will saves against emotion effects for 1 minute.

Effect: Mentor of Legends.name: Efekt: Mentor of Legends
Effect: Mentor of Legends.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.JBjRGWVtVaxLckfH]{Mentor of Legends}

The target gains temporary Hit Points equal to half your level.

Effect: Metallic Skin.name: Efekt: Metallic Skin
Effect: Metallic Skin.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.syyT2xBA4H72TpOt]{Metallic Skin}

You gain a +2 status bonus to AC and resistance 10 to physical damage (except adamantine), but you take a –10-foot penalty to Speed. If you take fire damage while this ability is active, until the end of your next turn, you deal an additional 2k6 fire damage with all your unarmed melee Strikes.

Effect: Methodical Debilitations (Cover).name: Efekt: Methodical Debilitations (Cover)
Effect: Methodical Debilitations (Cover).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.CkK7WwaWnrLXK9sW]{Methodical Debilitations}

You cannot gain a circumstance bonus to AC from Raising a Shield, lesser cover, or standard cover.

Effect: Methodical Debilitations (Flanki.name: Efekt: Methodical Debilitations (Flanking)
Effect: Methodical Debilitations (Flanki.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.CkK7WwaWnrLXK9sW]{Methodical Debilitations}

You are unable to flank or provide flanking.

Effect: Mirrored Aegis.name: Efekt: Mirrored Aegis
Effect: Mirrored Aegis.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.lJAQPRT2t8IABR4v]{Mirrored Aegis}

You gain a +1 status bonus to AC.

Effect: Moisture Bath.name: Efekt: Moisture Bath
Effect: Moisture Bath.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.IwETJ7fhszmlNo7X]{Moisture Bath}

You gain fire and cold resistance equal to half your level.

Effect: Monarch Wings.name: Efekt: Monarch Wings
Effect: Monarch Wings.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.IzNyByUBNH94MDOr]{Fey Ascension}

You gain a fly Speed equal to your Speed while you've manifested your wings.

Effect: Monster Hunter.name: Efekt: Monster Hunter
Effect: Monster Hunter.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.YTTJqRKH8QZl6al2]{Monster Hunter}

You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to your next attack roll against that prey.

0.label: Target is the subject of Monster Hunter

Effect: Monster Warden.name: Efekt: Monster Warden
Effect: Monster Warden.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.2yq3l8e2Vzz34yRV]{Monster Warden}

You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to your next attack roll against that prey.

You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to your next saving throw against that particular creature and to your AC against that creature's next attack against you.

0.label: Target is the subject of Monster Hunter

Effect: Mountain Strategy (Critically Hi.name: Efekt: Mountain Strategy (Critically Hit)
Effect: Mountain Strategy (Critically Hi.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.UFn85K7uDsZj5Hep]{Mountain Strategy}

Marks a target that critically hit you.

Effect: Mountain Stronghold.name: Efekt: Mountain Stronghold
Effect: Mountain Stronghold.description: You focus on your connection to the earth and call upon the mountain to block attacks against you. You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to AC until the beginning of your next turn.

Effect: Multifaceted Will.name: Efekt: Multifaceted Will
Effect: Multifaceted Will.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.LBfLDfLnCFn1iy5h]{Multifaceted Will}

You gain a +1 status bonus to saves against spells with the chosen tradition trait.

Effect: Mutagenist Field Benefit.name: Efekt: Mutagenist Field Benefit
Effect: Mutagenist Field Benefit.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.tvdb1jkjl2bRZjSp]{Mutagenist}

You gain temporary Hit Points equal to your Intelligence modifier plus half your level.

Effect: Mutate Weapon.name: Efekt: Mutate Weapon
Effect: Mutate Weapon.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.SWNmYaj0OSPhhIqO]{Mutate Weapon}

The damage die for the attack you gained with Living Weapon increases by one step. In addition, choose to either have the attack gain a reach of 10 feet or for you to gain a +1 status bonus to attack rolls with the chosen unarmed attack.

Effect: Mythic Allies.name: Efekt: Mythic Allies
Effect: Mythic Allies.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Lx7JtAhIn3aJ6WbP]{Mythic Allies}

You gain a +2 status bonus to your attack rolls, defenses, and a number of additional Hit Points equal to the origin's level. The next Strike you make gains a +4 circumstance bonus to the attack roll.

Effect: Mythic Allies (Circumstance Bonu.name: Efekt: Mythic Allies (Circumstance Bonus)
Effect: Mythic Allies (Circumstance Bonu.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Lx7JtAhIn3aJ6WbP]{Mythic Allies}

You gain a +4 circumstance bonus to your next attack roll.

Effect: Nanite Surge.name: Efekt: Nanite Surge
Effect: Nanite Surge.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.JS24EjgLYcHB9E3T]{Nanite Surge}.

Your circuitry glows, lighting a @Template[emanation|distance:10] with dim light for 1 round.

Effect: Nanite Surge (Bonus).name: Efekt: Nanite Surge (Bonus)
Effect: Nanite Surge (Bonus).description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.JS24EjgLYcHB9E3T]{Nanite Surge}.

You gain a +2 status bonus to the triggering skill check.

Effect: Nymph Blood Magic.name: Efekt: Nymph Blood Magic
Effect: Nymph Blood Magic.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.5Wxjghw7lHuCxjZz]{Bloodline: Nymph}

You gain a +1 status bonus to Diplomacy checks or a –1 status penalty on one target's Will saves for 1 round.

Effect: Oath of the Defender.name: Efekt: Oath of the Defender
Effect: Oath of the Defender.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.imBsp1Tg7KMut4Lf]{Oath of the Defender}

You gain resistance to damage dealt by creatures with the chosen trait.

Effect: Offensive Boost.name: Efekt: Offensive Boost
Effect: Offensive Boost.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.F8oXHnu9iNTcpXbJ]{Offensive Boost}

Your improvements make any Strikes that rely on your innovation deal an additional 1k6 damage, with a type determined by the boost you choose. If your innovation is armor, the boost applies to your melee Strikes with one weapon you choose during daily preparations; if your innovation is a construct, the boost applies to your construct companion's Strikes.

Effect: Offer Story.name: Efekt: Offer Story
Effect: Offer Story.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.7wQe43fSCG9DSWdj]{Offer Story}

You gain a +1 status bonus to AC and Will saves.

Effect: One Moment till Glory.name: Efekt: One Moment till Glory
Effect: One Moment till Glory.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.IEBBHnI7wWRt44KG]{One Moment till Glory}

You gain a +2 status bonus to your saving throw.

Effect: One with the Spirits.name: Efekt: One with the Spirits
Effect: One with the Spirits.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.OxdlGZ1rndxalf6X]{One with the Spirits}

You gain fast healing 5 and you become concealed. Your Strikes gain the benefits of a ghost touch property rune. Whenever you deal damage with a Strike, you can choose to have that Strike deal spirit damage, rather than its usual damage type.

Effect: Ongoing Selfishness.name: Efekt: Ongoing Selfishness
Effect: Ongoing Selfishness.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.MRMW0EiuOO20pzG2]{Ongoing Selfishness}

You gain resistance to all further damage from the triggering enemy until the end of the turn on which you used the reaction. This resistance is equal to half your Selfish Shield resistance.

Effect: Oni Form.name: Efekt: Oni Form
Effect: Oni Form.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.iCNNMJeGvsIzza4A]{Oni Form}

Your size increases to Large, and you're @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Niezdarny 1}. This doesn't change your Speed, reach, or other statistics except as noted here.

Effect: Only You and I.name: Efekt: Only You and I
Effect: Only You and I.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.8r9ePG6BnrnO6YE1]{Only You and I}

You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to attack rolls made against the exemplar. Whenever you miss the exemplar with a Strike, they heal 1k8+5 Hit Points.

Effect: Oracular Warning.name: Efekt: Oracular Warning
Effect: Oracular Warning.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Gcliatty0MGYbTVV]{Oracular Warning}

Each ally gains temporary Hit Points equal to half your level.

Effect: Oracular Warning (Initiative).name: Efekt: Oracular Warning (Initiative)
Effect: Oracular Warning (Initiative).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Gcliatty0MGYbTVV]{Oracular Warning}

Each ally gains a +2 status bonus to their initiative roll. If you are cursebound 2 when you use Oracular Warning, the bonus increases to +3, and if you are cursebound 3, the bonus increases to +4.

Effect: Orchard's Endurance.name: Efekt: Orchard's Endurance
Effect: Orchard's Endurance.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.cbEodcnBKzx5ii3B]{Orchard's Endurance}

You gain resistance to bludgeoning and piercing damage. In addition, you roll flat checks to recover from persistent damage twice and take the higher result; this is a fortune effect.

Effect: Overdrive.name: Efekt: Overdrive
Effect: Overdrive.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.3D9kGfwg4LUZBR9A]{Overdrive}

Your Strikes deal additional damage equal to your Intelligence modifier on a critical success, or half your Intelligence modifier on a success. On a failure, your Strikes deal 1 additional fire damage instead.

Effect: Overdrive Ally.name: Efekt: Overdrive Ally
Effect: Overdrive Ally.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.NBvhmNqneeok7ZOr]{Overdrive Ally}

Your Strikes deal additional damage equal to half your Intelligence modifier, or your full Intelligence modifier if you were in critical overdrive.

Effect: Overdrive Ally (Shared Overdrive.name: Efekt: Overdrive Ally (Shared Overdrive)
Effect: Overdrive Ally (Shared Overdrive.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.U0XX0Mm2MbZcuNK2]{Shared Overdrive}

The first time you use Overdrive Ally during a given Overdrive, the effect lasts for the remainder of the duration of your Overdrive, instead of just until the end of the target's next turn.

Effect: Overextending Feint.name: Efekt: Overextending Feint
Effect: Overextending Feint.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.9CaaU5szcf3mtJXD]{Overextending Feint}

You take a –2 circumstance penalty to attack rolls against the opponent.

Effect: Overwatch Field.name: Efekt: Overwatch Field
Effect: Overwatch Field.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.t03Tc5I4B8RHsyqs]{Overwatch Dedication}

You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to initiative rolls.

Effect: Packed with Flavor.name: Efekt: Packed with Flavor
Effect: Packed with Flavor.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.U1EMvL3PbEQZXqLy]{Packed with Flavor}

You gain temporary Hit Points.

Effect: Pain is Temporary.name: Efekt: Pain is Temporary
Effect: Pain is Temporary.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.j5VRy2iVz5aulQ1h]{Pain is Temporary}

You gain resistance 10 to all damage.

Effect: Pale Horse.name: Efekt: Pale Horse
Effect: Pale Horse.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.qPlv8HwtoO2fAjkj]{Pale Horse}

You gain resistance 10 to fire, poison, or void damage.

Effect: Panache.name: Efekt: Panache
Effect: Panache.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.LzYi0OuOoypNb6jd]{Panache}

You gain panache by performing actions that have the bravado trait.

Effect: Pass Vengeful Judgment.name: Efekt: Pass Vengeful Judgment
Effect: Pass Vengeful Judgment.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.lL5MxRUFqbzS6jDm]{Pass Vengeful Judgment}

You gain a +2 status bonus to Intimidation checks against creatures in the area within a 10-mile radius of where Pass Vengeful Judgment was used.

Effect: Path of the Tempest.name: Efekt: Ścieżka Nawałnicy
Effect: Path of the Tempest.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.familiar-abilities.Item.O0XJIvMGK36yg9TJ]{Ścieżka Nawałnicy}

Zyskujesz premię statusową +10 stóp do swojej Prędkości do końca swojej tury. Kiedy Biegniesz w tej turze, nie wywołujesz reakcji. Dodatkowo, nie musisz w tej turze Biec przed @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.JUvAvruz7yRQXfz2]{Skokiem w Dal}.

Effect: Perfect Resistance.name: Efekt: Perfect Resistance
Effect: Perfect Resistance.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.QN55ToyJIjxgPmhs]{Perfect Resistance}

After using a Student of Perfection ki spell, the resistance increases to be equal to your level for 1 round.

Effect: Phenom Verve.name: Efekt: Phenom Verve
Effect: Phenom Verve.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.4YqmeJQwnrG1Lg07]{Phenom's Verve}

You gain a +1 status bonus to your attack rolls with one-handed firearms and one-handed melee weapons.

Effect: Phoenix Blood Magic.name: Efekt: Phoenix Blood Magic
Effect: Phoenix Blood Magic.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.TWR1wbPJuCLnGdFZ]{Bloodline: Phoenix}

You gain temporary Hit Points equal to the spell's rank.

Effect: Pierce the Eye.name: Efekt: Pierce the Eye
Effect: Pierce the Eye.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.18eGaH5rWEXpDlgk]{Pierce the Eye}

You take a –2 circumstance penalty to Medicine checks to Administer First Aid to stop the bleeding.

Effect: Pinpoint Poisoner.name: Efekt: Pinpoint Poisoner
Effect: Pinpoint Poisoner.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.XtIPmZ3Ihq5NJHP2]{Pinpoint Poisoner}

The creature takes a –2 circumstance penalty to its initial save against that poison.

Effect: Pistolero's Challenge.name: Efekt: Pistolero's Challenge
Effect: Pistolero's Challenge.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.yOyMlFGAgLfRas8m]{Pistolero's Challenge}

Both you and the opponent gain a +2 status bonus to damage rolls with Strikes made against each other. If you're a master in the skill you used for the check, the status bonus to damage rolls increases to +3, and if you're legendary, it increases to +4.

Effect: Poison Weapon.name: Efekt: Poison Weapon
Effect: Poison Weapon.description: Applied when you apply a poison created with @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.ALbosSUygdq4T1Yk]{Poison Weapon}.

Effect: Portentous Spell.name: Efekt: Portentous Spell
Effect: Portentous Spell.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.rRbMOxX1QTHIIwAi]{Portentous Spell}.

Any creature that attempts to use a reaction triggered by your Cast a Spell activity takes a –2 circumstance penalty to attack rolls and skill checks rolled as part of the reaction.

Effect: Portents of the Haruspex.name: Efekt: Portents of the Haruspex
Effect: Portents of the Haruspex.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.tz0gvfTwcDq0yEfg]{Portents of the Haruspex}

Roll 1k12 to determine the damage type. The next time before the end of your next turn that you or your allies deals that damage type to an enemy, that enemy has weakness equal to your level against that damage.

Effect: Prayer-Touched Weapon.name: Efekt: Prayer-Touched Weapon
Effect: Prayer-Touched Weapon.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.2qR4QAgJVArv63Z2]{Prayer-Touched Weapon}

The chosen weapon deals an extra 1k6 vitality damage.

Effect: Precious Ammunition.name: Efekt: Precious Ammunition
Effect: Precious Ammunition.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.MlxfNv98LZKfYl64]{Precious Ammunition}

Choose cold iron or silver; if you shoot the arrow or bolt before the end of your turn, it counts as that material. At 14. level, add adamantine to the list of materials you can choose from.

Effect: Precise Debilitations.name: Efekt: Precise Debilitations
Effect: Precise Debilitations.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.wvJBIzgS298ZRp6w]{Precise Debilitations}

The target takes an additional 2k6 precision damage from your attacks.

Effect: Predictable!.name: Efekt: Predictable!
Effect: Predictable!.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.cErltcAC7OVnIyO1]{Predictable!}

You gain a circumstance bonus to AC and your next saving throw against the target. On a critical failure, you take a –1 circumstance penalty instead.

Effect: Predictable! (Saving Throw).name: Efekt: Predictable! (Saving Throw)
Effect: Predictable! (Saving Throw).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.cErltcAC7OVnIyO1]{Predictable}

You gain a circumstance bonus to your next saving throw against the target. On a critical failure, you take a –1 circumstance penalty instead.

Effect: Premonition of Clarity.name: Efekt: Premonition of Clarity
Effect: Premonition of Clarity.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.2h8a6pKhXTXwpJjP]{Premonition of Clarity}

Reroll the triggering saving throw with a +2 circumstance bonus.

Effect: Prepare Elemental Medicine.name: Efekt: Przygotowanie Lekarstwa Żywiołów
Effect: Prepare Elemental Medicine.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.NMbOfl885pn0Yzu9]{Przygotowanie Lekarstwa Żywiołów}

Otrzymujesz premię sytuacyjną do rzutów obronnych przeciw dolegliwości lub karę sytuacyjną –1 przy krytycznej porażce.

Jeśli posiadasz @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.qaiwbAb1PaKrZ2O0]{Umocnienie Energii} i użyjesz Okultyzmu do Przygotowania Lekarstwa Żywiołów, pacjent zyskuje odporność i podatność na obrażenia od pustki i obrażenia od witalności, zależne od wybranego przez ciebie żywiołu.

Effect: Prevailing Position.name: Efekt: Prevailing Position
Effect: Prevailing Position.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Xw7qG0SHepXx24vl]{Prevailing Position}

You gain a +4 circumstance bonus to the triggering saving throw or to your AC against the triggering attack.

Effect: Pride in Arms.name: Efekt: Pride in Arms
Effect: Pride in Arms.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.CCY6VsGjp5fdmM6K]{Pride in Arms}

You gain temporary Hit Points equal to your Constitution modifier.

Effect: Primal Aegis.name: Efekt: Primal Aegis
Effect: Primal Aegis.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.AbjVJIBdNjbQbVnV]{Primal Aegis}

You gain resistance to acid, cold, electricity, fire, vitality, and void damage.

Effect: Propulsive Leap.name: Efekt: Propulsive Leap
Effect: Propulsive Leap.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.q8c0LINVNcJrdK91]{Propulsive Leap}

You gain a fly Speed equal to your Speed or 20 feet, whichever is greater.

Effect: Protective Cycle.name: Efekt: Protective Cycle
Effect: Protective Cycle.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.7G1gMSHyMdMGMsF9]{Protective Cycle}

You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to AC.

Effect: Protective Pose.name: Efekt: Protective Pose
Effect: Protective Pose.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.A9WrbBCCdYsmdKGv]{Protective Pose}

You gain resistance to either acid, cold, electricity, fire, or sonic damage equal to half the origin's level.

Effect: Protective Spirit Mask.name: Efekt: Protective Spirit Mask
Effect: Protective Spirit Mask.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.nn7DiYYWinsSYrZy]{Protective Spirit Mask}

You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to AC until the start of the caster's next turn.

Effect: Proud Mentor.name: Efekt: Proud Mentor
Effect: Proud Mentor.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.vD3l0Xn4hb7xnQic]{Proud Mentor}

You gain temporary Hit Points equal to your level.

Effect: Psi Strikes.name: Efekt: Psi Strikes
Effect: Psi Strikes.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.uisI6b7Ua5zSHDwj]{Psi Strikes}

The attack deals an extra 1k6 force damage.

Effect: Psychic Rapport.name: Efekt: Psychic Rapport
Effect: Psychic Rapport.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.9oKtrUzXixj58hOg]{Psychic Rapport}
