You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to Deception, Diplomacy, and Intimidation checks, and to Perception checks to Sense Motive.

Effect: Psychopomp Blood Magic (Self).name: Efekt: Psychopomp Blood Magic (Self)
Effect: Psychopomp Blood Magic (Self).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.PpzH9tJULk5ksX9w]{Bloodline: Psychopomp}

You gain a +2 status bonus to Fortitude saving throws.

Effect: Purifying Breeze.name: Efekt: Purifying Breeze
Effect: Purifying Breeze.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.k42ntHdg70ZMEKrs]{Purifying Breeze}

You gain a +1 status bonus to Fortitude saving throws.

Effect: Push Back the Dead!.name: Efekt: Push Back the Dead!
Effect: Push Back the Dead!.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.BtZJJClWCpc31Ven]{Push Back the Dead!}

You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to saves against effects originating from undead. You also gain resistance to damage from Strikes made by undead creatures.

Effect: Pushing Wind.name: Efekt: Pushing Wind
Effect: Pushing Wind.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.GxkTe4VM7u26uZGI]{Pushing Wind}

You gain a +5-foot circumstance bonus to land Speed.

Effect: Race the Skies.name: Efekt: Race the Skies
Effect: Race the Skies.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.MrTULCUsE9naPxXg]{Race the Skies}

You gain a fly Speed equal to your Speed or 20 feet, whichever is greater.

Effect: Radiant Circuitry.name: Efekt: Radiant Circuitry
Effect: Radiant Circuitry.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.2XmdYW8OsAvjGDG3]{Radiant Circuitry}.

You emit bright light in a 20-foot radius (and dim light for the next 20 feet).

Effect: Rage.name: Efekt: Szał
Effect: Rage.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Ah5g9pDwWF9b9VW9]{Szał}

Zyskujesz tymczasowe Punkty Żywotności w liczbie równej sumie twojego poziomu i twojego modyfikatora Kondycji.

Zadajesz 2 dodatkowe punkty obrażeń Ciosami w zwarciu. Te dodatkowe obrażenia są zmniejszane o połowę, jeśli twoja broń lub atak wręcz są chyże.

Kiedy skończy się twój szał tracisz wszystkie pozostałe tymczasowe Punkty Żywotności, które zapewniał, oraz nie możesz ponownie zyskać tymczasowych Punktów Żywotności z użyciem akcji Szału prez 1 minutę.

Effect: Rage Temporary Hit Points Immuni.name: Efekt: Niewrażliwość na Tymczasowe Punkty Żywotności z Szału
Effect: Rage Temporary Hit Points Immuni.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Ah5g9pDwWF9b9VW9]{Szał}

Nie możesz ponownie zyskać tymczasowych Punktów Żywotności wynikających z użycia akcji Szału.

Effect: Raging Stories.name: Efekt: Raging Stories
Effect: Raging Stories.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.3GmgFUL2xzt5vhCz]{Raging Stories}

Your melee Strikes deal 2 additional fire damage. The fire damage increases to 4 if you are a master of Religion and 6 if you are legendary.

Effect: Raise Menhir.name: Efekt: Raise Menhir
Effect: Raise Menhir.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.BuVIM4cV7qhVZ2WF]{Raise Menhir}

Choose arcane, divine, or occult; all creatures within 15 feet of the monument gain a +2 status bonus to their saving throws against effects with that trait.

Effect: Raise Symbol.name: Efekt: Raise Symbol
Effect: Raise Symbol.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.koER7gKf6CnW5O0s]{Raise Symbol}

You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to saving throws until the start of your next turn. While it's raised, if you roll a success at a saving throw against a vitality or void effect, you get a critical success instead.

Effect: Raise the Walls.name: Efekt: Raise the Walls
Effect: Raise the Walls.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.IBEbFlMmDbGsrN4G]{Raise the Walls}

You gain a +1 status bonus to AC, Reflex saves, and any save against force, spirit, vitality, or void effect.

Effect: Rallying Charge.name: Efekt: Rallying Charge
Effect: Rallying Charge.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.df4cBV3qZn3qNUmP]{Rallying Charge}

You gain temporary hit points equal to the Charisma modifier of the creature that used Rallying Charge.

Effect: Rampaging Form.name: Efekt: Rampaging Form
Effect: Rampaging Form.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Zl6vDXJEM7Lbp8JQ]{Rampaging Form}

You Change Shape into a form of living ice for 1 minute or until you shift back. Your battle form is Huge and has the following statistics:

  • AC = 18 + your level. Ignore your armor's check penalty and Speed reduction.
  • 20 temporary Hit Points.
  • Low-light vision and imprecise scent 30 feet.
  • A Speed of 30, a Fly speed of 40, and you don't need to breathe
  • Melee a jaws, Damage 2k8 piercing + 1k4 fire damage.
  • Your unarmed attacks deal 1k4 additional fire damage, and your fire spells deal one additional die of fire damage (of the same damage die the spell uses).
  • You can cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.O9w7r4BKgPogYDDe]{Wytworzenie Płomienia} as an innate spell; the casting is reduced from 2 actions to 1.
  • Any creature that touches you or damages you with an unarmed attack or non-reach melee weapon takes @Damage[3d6[fire]] damage.
  • Athletics modifier of +20, unless your own modifier is higher.

Effect: Rampaging Form (Frozen Winds Kit.name: Efekt: Rampaging Form (Frozen Winds Kitsune)
Effect: Rampaging Form (Frozen Winds Kit.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Zl6vDXJEM7Lbp8JQ]{Rampaging Form}

You Change Shape into a form of living ice for 1 minute or until you shift back. Your battle form is Huge and has the following statistics:

  • AC = 18 + your level. Ignore your armor's check penalty and Speed reduction.
  • 20 temporary Hit Points.
  • Low-light vision and imprecise scent 30 feet.
  • A Speed of 30, a Fly speed of 40, and you don't need to breathe
  • Melee a jaws, Damage 2k8 piercing + 1k4 cold damage.
  • Your unarmed attacks deal 1k4 additional cold damage, and your cold spells deal one additional die of cold damage (of the same damage die the spell uses).
  • You can cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.gYjPm7YwGtEa1oxh]{Promień Mrozu} as an innate spell; the casting is reduced from 2 actions to 1.
  • Any creature that touches you or damages you with an unarmed attack or non-reach melee weapon takes @Damage[3d6[cold]] damage.
  • Athletics modifier of +20, unless your own modifier is higher.

Effect: Read Shibboleths.name: Efekt: Read Shibboleths
Effect: Read Shibboleths.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Crd3qMecF9FYHjuH]{Read Shibboleths}

You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to your Diplomacy and Deception checks.

Effect: Reanimator Dedication.name: Efekt: Dedykacja Reanimator
Effect: Reanimator Dedication.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.5Cm2TYHzoO2DbQNM]{Reanimator Dedication}

You gain a +1 status bonus to attack rolls, AC, saving throws, and skill checks for the duration of summon undead.

Effect: Rebirth in Living Stone.name: Efekt: Rebirth in Living Stone
Effect: Rebirth in Living Stone.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.mNiJvsbyxdLBnTRs]{Rebirth in Living Stone}

You gain temporary Hit Points. You're immune to critical hits and precision damage. Your earth Elemental Blasts deal an additional 1k10 damage of their normal type.

Effect: Recall Under Pressure.name: Efekt: Recall Under Pressure
Effect: Recall Under Pressure.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.lH3mlvs1rCyXw6iY]{Recall Under Pressure}

You gain a +1 status bonus to saving throws for the remainder of the combat encounter as your morale soars or a +2 status bonus if the card you drew was from the suit of Books.

Effect: Reckless Abandon (Goblin).name: Efekt: Reckless Abandon (Goblin)
Effect: Reckless Abandon (Goblin).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.fqw1ELaqavuKLHIj]{Reckless Abandon}

If you roll a failure or critical failure on a saving throw against a harmful effect, you get a success instead.

Effect: Reflexive Shield.name: Efekt: Reflexive Shield
Effect: Reflexive Shield.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.dHUoQVzDa9Cf4QCG]{Reflexive Shield}

You gain your shield's cricumstance bonus to Reflex saves.

Effect: Regalia.name: Efekt: Regalia
Effect: Regalia.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.DhdLzrcMvB93Rjmt]{Regalia}

You gain a +1 status bonus to saving throws against fear. If the origin has Regalia as an adept implement, this status bonus applies to mental effects, and you gain a status bonus to damage rolls.

If the origin has Regalia as a paragon implement, you aren't off-guard from being flanked unless the origin is flanked, and the status penalty you take from being clumsy, enfeebled, frightened, sickened, or stupefied is reduced by 1, unless the origin is affected by the same condition.

Effect: Regional Specialty.name: Efekt: Regional Specialty
Effect: Regional Specialty.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.l1I6bmdm31MPwmWU]{Regional Specialty}

You gain an item bonus against certain saves depending on the chosen element.

  • Wood Against disease and poison effects.
  • Fire Against being doomed or frightened.
  • Earth Against being enfeebled.
  • Metal Against being stupefied.
  • Water Against deafened or drained.

Effect: Renewed Vigor.name: Efekt: Renewed Vigor
Effect: Renewed Vigor.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.3hhCDWPm021hvicR]{Renewed Vigor}

You gain temporary Hit Points equal to half your level plus your Constitution modifier. If you made an attack action this turn, increase the number of temporary Hit Points to your level plus your Constitution modifier.

Effect: Renewing Cycle.name: Efekt: Renewing Cycle
Effect: Renewing Cycle.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.frRJAuuAgDg3RFii]{Renewing Cycle}

You gain temporary Hit Points equal to half your level.

Effect: Repair Module.name: Efekt: Repair Module
Effect: Repair Module.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.ZGT7NLpcvREkJsMd]{Repair Module}.

You gain fast healing equal to half your level.

Effect: Repel Ambient Magic.name: Efekt: Repel Ambient Magic
Effect: Repel Ambient Magic.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.SN3sVsU7rD2eBfkf]{Repel Ambient Magic}

You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to AC and saving throws against the next magical attack, cantrip, or spell that targets you. This bonus increases to +2 at 12th level.

Effect: Replenishment of War.name: Efekt: Replenishment of War
Effect: Replenishment of War.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.aMef2VM4mSxl0pmy]{Replenishment of War}

You gain a number of temporary Hit Points equal to half your level, or equal to your level if the Strike was a critical hit.

Effect: Resounding Bravery.name: Efekt: Resounding Bravery
Effect: Resounding Bravery.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.dTO1ShJovbzrKUY4]{Resounding Bravery}

You gain a +1 status bonus to saves and a number of temporary Hit Points equal to half your level. On a Critical Success, you gain a +2 status bonus to saves and a number of temporary Hit Points equal to your level.

Effect: Resounding Finale.name: Efekt: Resounding Finale
Effect: Resounding Finale.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.lhSqWHXK1JShUabF]{Resounding Finale}

You gain sonic resistance against the triggering damage.

Effect: Restorative Strike.name: Efekt: Restorative Strike
Effect: Restorative Strike.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.xUlRLkWnfZ7reej6]{Restorative Strike}

Cast a 1-action @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.wdA52JJnsuQWeyqz]{Krzywdzenie} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.rfZpqmj0AIIdkVIs]{Leczenie} spell to heal yourself, expending the spell normally. It loses the manipulate trait when cast this way. Then make a melee Strike. If you make this Strike with your deity's favored weapon, you gain a +1 status bonus to the attack roll.

If the Strike hits, you can target a second willing creature to heal the same amount from the spell. This creature can be outside of the spell's range, provided it's adjacent to the enemy you hit.

Effect: Revitalizing Finisher.name: Efekt: Revitalizing Finisher
Effect: Revitalizing Finisher.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.83zzG4XBiL5I3NZv]{Revitalizing Finisher}

You gain temporary Hit Points.

Effect: Roaring Heart.name: Efekt: Roaring Heart
Effect: Roaring Heart.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.F6TIEmYYJGmVhMXl]{Roaring Heart}

You gain temporary Hit Points.

Effect: Rod of Rule.name: Efekt: Rod of Rule
Effect: Rod of Rule.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.ZELjVKOohGw3ECwB]{Rod of Rule}

You take –2 circumstance penalty to saves against any of the origin's curriculum or sin spells.

Effect: Roll the Bones of Fate (Good).name: Efekt: Roll the Bones of Fate (Good)
Effect: Roll the Bones of Fate (Good).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.7Q7HWETkvOM9pYwV]{Roll the Bones of Fate}

You can roll twice on your next attack roll or skill check, taking the higher result.

Effect: Root Magic.name: Efekt: Magia Znachorska
Effect: Root Magic.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.22P7IFyhrF7Fbw8B]{Magię Znachorską}

Zyskujesz premię sytuacyjną do rzutu obronnego przeciwko zaklęciu lub straszydłu.

Effect: Ruthless Orator.name: Efekt: Ruthless Orator
Effect: Ruthless Orator.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.7HZaOlJ43QxkDrmO]{Ruthless Orator}

Any hostile creatures within 20 feet take a –2 circumstance penalty to attack rolls and spell attack rolls that target you.

Effect: Ruthless Orator (Enemy).name: Efekt: Ruthless Orator (Enemy)
Effect: Ruthless Orator (Enemy).description:
Granted by Ruthless Orator

You take a –2 circumstance penalty to attack rolls and spell attack rolls against the origin.

Effect: Safeguard Soul.name: Efekt: Safeguard Soul
Effect: Safeguard Soul.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.tBg3FZST3nX5TfLf]{Safeguard Soul}

You gain a +2 status bonus to saving throws against death effects, possession effects, and effects that attempt to manipulate or steal your soul.

Effect: Sanctify Armament.name: Efekt: Sanctify Armament
Effect: Sanctify Armament.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.xtXWw3cUnVB25XSV]{Sanctify Armament}

The weapon gains your holy or unholy trait. It also deals an additional 2k6 spirit damage to creatures of the opposed trait.

Effect: Saoc Astrology.name: Efekt: Saoc Astrology
Effect: Saoc Astrology.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.csoGdGuWasEw3boD]{Saoc Astrology}

You gain the selected circumstance bonus or penalty to skill checks.

Effect: Scout (Incredible Scout).name: Efekt: Scout (Incredible Scout)
Effect: Scout (Incredible Scout).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.aFoVHsuInMOkTZoQ]{Incredible Scout}

You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to your initiative roll.

Effect: Scout's Warning.name: Efekt: Scout's Warning
Effect: Scout's Warning.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Tpcq3Lk7qEOZ3LDP]{Scout's Warning}

You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to your initiative roll (+2 if you also benefit from @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.kV3XM0YJeS2KCSOb]{Scout}).

Effect: Sea Glass Guardians.name: Efekt: Sea Glass Guardians
Effect: Sea Glass Guardians.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.CAHJGt535l3Ai4cR]{Sea Glass Guardians}

You gain a +1 status bonus to AC and saving throws.

Effect: Seedpod.name: Efekt: Seedpod
Effect: Seedpod.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.dWGa6cFSVrASTEfd]{Seedpod}

You take a –10-foot circumstance penalty to your Speed.

Effect: Selfish Shield.name: Efekt: Selfish Shield
Effect: Selfish Shield.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.enQieRrITuEQZxx2]{Selfish Shield}

You gain resistance against the triggering damage equal to 2 + half your level, regardless of damage type.

Effect: Shadow Blood Magic.name: Efekt: Shadow Blood Magic
Effect: Shadow Blood Magic.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.uoQOm41BVdSo6pAS]{Bloodline: Shadow}

You gain a +1 status bonus to Stealth or a –1 status penalty to Perception.

Effect: Shadow Sheath Weapon.name: Efekt: Shadow Sheath Weapon
Effect: Shadow Sheath Weapon.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.ktgzHtKoeUZ5H8KA]{Shadow Sheath}

You load a weapon into the sheath.

Immanence Your Strikes with the weapon deal 2 additional spirit damage per weapon damage die, which increases to 3 per die if the target is off-guard.

Effect: Share Rage.name: Efekt: Share Rage
Effect: Share Rage.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.vayNZR1bTzU1oUa3]{Share Rage}

You gain a number of temporary Hit Points equal to your level plus your Constitution modifier. While you are raging, you deal 2 additional damage on melee Strikes. This additional damage is halved if your weapon or unarmed attack is agile.

Effect: Shared Avoidance.name: Efekt: Shared Avoidance
Effect: Shared Avoidance.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.wIJC00ODLq9WYc1m]{Shared Avoidance}

You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to your saving throws against the hazard.

Effect: Shared Clarity.name: Efekt: Shared Clarity
Effect: Shared Clarity.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.ybrx1nsg5J0L8d3j]{Shared Clarity}

You can reroll the failed saving throw against the mental effect with a +2 circumstance bonus.

Effect: Shattershields.name: Efekt: Shattershields
Effect: Shattershields.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.QOnyOjncnw4tkTQp]{Shattershields}

You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to AC.

Effect: Shed Tail.name: Efekt: Shed Tail
Effect: Shed Tail.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.t3IzY8uSyFj3aGmh]{Shed Tail}

You take a –2 circumstance penalty on checks to Balance.

Effect: Sheltering Pulse.name: Efekt: Sheltering Pulse
Effect: Sheltering Pulse.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.HP1DKj4FLwtStzYq]{Sheltering Pulse}

You gain a +1 status bonus to AC.

Effect: Shield Ally.name: Efekt: Shield Ally
Effect: Shield Ally.description: The hardness of your equipped shield increases by 2.

Effect: Shield of Faith.name: Efekt: Shield of Faith
Effect: Shield of Faith.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.w3qyriA1YnzXaas3]{Shield of Faith}

You gain a +1 status bonus to your AC.

Effect: Shield the Faithful.name: Efekt: Shield the Faithful
Effect: Shield the Faithful.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.VYwWqm5LZOU7irhY]{Shield the Faithful}

You gain a +1 item bonus to AC and resistance to spirit damage.

Effect: Shielding Wave.name: Efekt: Shielding Wave
Effect: Shielding Wave.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.yOk8s1pftOe5I9Sg]{Shielding Wave}

You gain resistance to acid or fire damage.

Effect: Shining Arms.name: Efekt: Shining Arms
Effect: Shining Arms.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.iAziUKdxgy4k4ypY]{Shining Arms}

When a creature wielding the weapon critically hits a foe, you can Dismiss the spell as a reaction, causing the foe to be dazzled for 1 round

Effect: Shining Glory.name: Efekt: Shining Glory
Effect: Shining Glory.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.tKC06HYkt1XaWk78]{Shining Glory}

You gain a +3 status bonus to attack rolls and skill checks, and the status bonus you receive to saving throws against fear increases to +3.

Effect: Show Off.name: Efekt: Show Off
Effect: Show Off.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.DMjfZvWD20SGuIO4]{Show-Off}

You gain temporary Hit Points equal to your level (double your level on a critical success).

Effect: Signature Weapon.name: Efekt: Signature Weapon
Effect: Signature Weapon.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.yiZwGVErxzWCJOlW]{Signature Weapon}

You gain access to its critical specialization effect of the selected weapon.

Effect: Silk Bracelet.name: Efekt: Silk Bracelet
Effect: Silk Bracelet.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.bI0PWJ4c3AOcFDWN]{Silk Bracelet}

You gain a –10 foot status penalty to all your Speeds for 1 round.

Effect: Siphon Torment.name: Efekt: Siphon Torment
Effect: Siphon Torment.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.XdicxD5jMJ8JSVqk]{Siphon Torment}

You gain temporary Hit Points equal to the origin's level.

Effect: Sixth Pillar Mastery.name: Efekt: Sixth Pillar Mastery
Effect: Sixth Pillar Mastery.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.sFAqKrzqXQhtrfqN]{Sixth Pillar Mastery}

You have a –1 status penalty to saves against spells from the source, or you gain a +1 status bonus to attack rolls with your unarmed Strikes.

Effect: Smite.name: Efekt: Smite
Effect: Smite.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.xgvKXeTxns0gIdAn]{Smite}.

Designate one enemy you can see. Until the start of your next turn, your Strikes against that enemy gain a +3 status bonus to damage, increasing to +4 if you have master proficiency with the weapon or unarmed attack you're using for the Strike. If you're holy or unholy and the target has the opposite trait, the bonus is +4 (or +6 if you're a master).

Effect: Smite Good.name: Efekt: Smite Good
Effect: Smite Good.description:
Granted by Smite Good.

Until the start of your next turn, your Strikes against that foe using the weapon your blade ally inhabits deal an extra 4 spirit damage if the target is holy, increasing to 6 if you have master proficiency with this weapon.

If the chosen enemy attacks you before the start of your next turn, the duration extends to the end of that enemy's next turn. If the enemy continues to attack you each turn, the duration continues to extend.

Effect: Snap Out of It! (Marshal).name: Efekt: Snap Out of It! (Marshal)
Effect: Snap Out of It! (Marshal).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.zbnL5OP4zVaNFcq8]{Snap Out of It! (Marshal)}

You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to your Will save.

Effect: Sniping Duo Dedication.name: Efekt: Sniping Duo Dedication
Effect: Sniping Duo Dedication.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.6PP57Aa5HmSr0qIZ]{Sniping Duo Dedication}.

Whenever you or your spotter successfully Strikes a target, the other member of your duo gains a +1 circumstance bonus per weapon damage die on the damage roll of their next Strike made against that target before the end of their next turn.

Effect: Soaring Flight.name: Efekt: Soaring Flight
Effect: Soaring Flight.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Tl8yckXeTCHnwrlM]{Soaring Flight}

You gain a fly Speed of 20 feet for this movement.

Effect: Soothing Vials.name: Efekt: Soothing Vials
Effect: Soothing Vials.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.BAsKBwlbJAQ6sLhN]{Soothing Vials}

The creature gains a +1 item bonus to the new Will saving throw.

Effect: Soul Vessel Mount.name: Efekt: Soul Vessel Mount
Effect: Soul Vessel Mount.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.drcZf55HVsTnnTcF]{Soul Vessel Mount}

You gain a +20-foot status bonus to your Speed.

Effect: Spark Fist.name: Efekt: Spark Fist
Effect: Spark Fist.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.BL2nLeClO30QoQGs]{Spark Fist}

Your fist loses the nonlethal trait and deals additional fire damage on a successful Strike.

Effect: Spell Parry.name: Efekt: Spell Parry
Effect: Spell Parry.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.X9AkydrMdFwg7qIn]{Spell Parry}

You raise your guard, gaining a +1 circumstance bonus to AC and to saving throws against spells that target you.

Effect: Spell Protection Array.name: Efekt: Pierścień Ochrony przed Zaklęciami
Effect: Spell Protection Array.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.3CPKbiweBRzXAJA9]{Pierścień Ochrony przed Zaklęciami}

Zyskujesz premię statusową +1 do rzutów obronnych przeciwko magii.

Effect: Spin Tale.name: Efekt: Spin Tale
Effect: Spin Tale.description: You gain a +1 status bonus to attack rolls and saving throws against the villain until the start of your next turn.

2.label: Target is villain of Folklorist's Spun Tale

Effect: Spiral Sworn.name: Efekt: Spiral Sworn
Effect: Spiral Sworn.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.ef57tIj30IaPnSgC]{Spiral Sworn}

Your Strikes and spells deal additional damage against undead, creatures in possession of an imprisoned soul, or creatures you have witnessed create or command undead. You gain a status bonus to damage with your Strikes against these creatures equal to the number of weapon damage dice. Spells you cast from spell slots gain a status bonus to damage against these creatures equal to the rank of the spell; this bonus applies only to spells that deal damage and don't have a duration.

Effect: Spirit Guide Form.name: Efekt: Spirit Guide Form
Effect: Spirit Guide Form.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.WKRSBu7H9miAwUaR]{Spirit Guide Form}

You fuse with your spirit guide, becoming a hybrid being with enhanced physical and spiritual power. This effect lasts 1 minute; you can end it early as a free action. During this time, you can't use any other actions granted by this archetype. You gain the following statistics and abilities, regardless of your type of spirit guide.

  • You become incorporeal.
  • You gain resistance 10 to all damage (except force, ghost touch, or vitality; double resistance vs. non-magical).
  • Darkvision.
  • An unarmed melee attack of the same type as your spirit guide (either claws or jaws), which is the only attack you can Strike with. You're trained with this attack. Your attack modifier is +29 or your normal unarmed attack modifier, whichever is higher. You use the listed statistics for the unarmed attack type:
    • Claws (agile, backstabber, finesse) 1, Damage 3k6+5 slashing plus 1k6 force;
    • Jaws (forceful) 1, Damage 3k10+5 piercing plus 1k6 force.

Effect: Spirit's Mercy.name: Efekt: Spirit's Mercy
Effect: Spirit's Mercy.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.SPtzUNatWJvTK61y]{Spirit's Mercy}

You gain resistance to vitality and void damage (or resistance to all damage if caused by a haunt or incorporeal undead) against the triggering effect. If you expend a spirit wisp, the resistance is equal to twice your level. If you expend a spirit remnant, the resistance is equal to three times the level of the incorporeal undead or haunt from which you gained the remnant.

Effect: Staggering Fire.name: Efekt: Staggering Fire
Effect: Staggering Fire.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.fngPLUD4Sltho2kn]{Staggering Fire}

You take a –5-foot circumstance penalty to your Speed, or a –10-foot circumstance penalty on a critical hit.

Effect: Starlight Armor.name: Efekt: Starlight Armor
Effect: Starlight Armor.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.jK0hjx4qsRyKnpBd]{Starlight Armor}

You gain resistance 7 to piercing, bludgeoning, and slashing damage. You also shed bright light for 20 feet (and dim light for the next 20 feet).

When you reach 17th level, the resistance increases to 10.

Effect: Starlit Transformation.name: Efekt: Starlit Transformation
Effect: Starlit Transformation.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.M4ALaFXoQDJGxSsI]{Starlit Transformation}

Your weapon gains a +1 status bonus to damage rolls. You can fling bolts of starlight from your weapon with a Strike action, using your melee attack modifier with the weapon. These bolts deal 1k4 force damage and have the arcane and force traits.

Effect: Steal Death.name: Efekt: Steal Death
Effect: Steal Death.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Kb28vpCQNvA6wS1O]{Steal Death}

You gain fast healing as long as you and your apocalypse mount are within 10 feet of each other. If you use Steal Death again, your fast healing increases by 1.

Effect: Steel Yourself!.name: Efekt: Steel Yourself!
Effect: Steel Yourself!.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.4Y7wKFogGB0LZ5ZA]{Steel Yourself!}

You gain temporary Hit Points and a +2 circumstance bonus to Fortitude saves.

Effect: Stone Body.name: Efekt: Stone Body
Effect: Stone Body.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.xgg9eNF6MsJPMjyH]{Stone Body}

You gain resistance 10 to all damage.

Effect: Stoney Deflection.name: Efekt: Stoney Deflection
Effect: Stoney Deflection.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.CSa7v4MtbiA3FI0c]{Stoney Deflection}

You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to AC and to any defenses against being Shoved or Tripped

Effect: Storied Companion.name: Efekt: Storied Companion
Effect: Storied Companion.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.tQvWDkatsuYsNkds]{Storied Companion}

You gain temporary Hit Points equal to twice the origin's level.

Effect: Strain Mind.name: Efekt: Strain Mind
Effect: Strain Mind.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.u8YnTCS2EGoJl90W]{Strain Mind}

You add an amp that costs 1 Focus Point to the spell. Instead of paying the normal Focus Point cost, you lose Hit Points equal to four times the spell rank of the amped psi cantrip as you bleed from your nose or suffer some other visible sign of strain.

Effect: Strained Metabolism.name: Efekt: Strained Metabolism
Effect: Strained Metabolism.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.huDGjojm3hnuA1E8]{Strained Metabolism}

Mild Backlash You become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Osłabiony 1} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Niezdarny 1} until you take a bite of food (which usually requires 2 Interact actions: one to retrieve the food and another to consume it).

Moderate Backlash You are enfeebled 1, clumsy 1, and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.HL2l2VRSaQHu9lUw]{Wyczerpany} until you can eat a full meal, which requires at least 10 minutes.

Severe Backlash You become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Zemdlony 2} as nausea wracks you, and you are also enfeebled 1 and clumsy 1 until you can eat a full meal (which requires you to no longer be sickened). You are fatigued until you can get a full night's rest.

Effect: Strategist Stance.name: Efekt: Strategist Stance
Effect: Strategist Stance.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.fJwsZM6WXwP8EStV]{Strategist Stance}

Your marshal's aura grants you and allies a +1 status bonus to Reflex saving throws

Effect: Striking Retribution.name: Efekt: Striking Retribution
Effect: Striking Retribution.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.TGlb3gmSKkJBZt5q]{Striking Retribution}

Your circumstance bonus to damage with weapons and unarmed attacks against creatures from the alghollthu family and those that serve alghollthus increases to +4

Effect: Stymie the Gods.name: Efekt: Stymie the Gods
Effect: Stymie the Gods.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.S2YTLXTvqaXhThG6]{Stymie the Gods}

You gain a status bonus to AC and to saving throws against divine spells, as well as the spells, Strikes, and abilities of extraplanar creatures.

Effect: Supercharge Prosthetic Eyes.name: Efekt: Supercharge Prosthetic Eyes
Effect: Supercharge Prosthetic Eyes.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.qV6EuOI3UJYIL6xa]{Consolidated Overlay Panopticon}

You gain darkvision and low-light vision, and you gain a +1 status bonus to visual Perception checks.

Effect: Surgical Shock (Failure).name: Efekt: Surgical Shock (Porażka)
Effect: Surgical Shock (Failure).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.zzjfENthtRBAjqjQ]{Surgical Shock}

You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to the next attack action you attempt against the target.

Effect: Survive the Wilds.name: Efekt: Survive the Wilds
Effect: Survive the Wilds.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.NdMSHDtV9G7MbdP2]{Survive the Wilds}

You and all allies in a 15-foot emanation gain a +2 circumstance bonus to AC and saving throws against effects with the trait the pelt is attuned to.

Effect: Sword Practice.name: Efekt: Sword Practice
Effect: Sword Practice.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.AmFv3ClkAVRowHLI]{Tengu Weapon Familiarity}

During your daily preparations, you can practice with a weapon from the sword group that's in your possession. You gain familiarity with that weapon as well. This lasts until you practice with a different sword in the same way.

Effect: Tactical Debilitations (No Flank.name: Efekt: Tactical Debilitations (No Flanking)
Effect: Tactical Debilitations (No Flank.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Xdmz09kzLjIxWz9C]{Tactical Debilitations}

The target can't flank or contribute to allies' flanking.

Effect: Tail Toxin.name: Efekt: Tail Toxin
Effect: Tail Toxin.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.ev8OHpBO3xq3Zt08]{Tail Toxin}

You apply your tail's venom to a piercing or slashing weapon. If your next Strike with that weapon before the end of your next turn hits and deals damage, you deal persistent poison damage equal to your level to the target.

Effect: Tap the Past.name: Efekt: Tap the Past
Effect: Tap the Past.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.jsEBrm8SPcsokJLw]{Tap the Past}

You roll a second time and use the higher result. If you roll a critical failure, you get a failure instead. If you roll a success, you get a critical success instead.

Effect: Terrain Attunement (Aquatic).name: Efekt: Terrain Attunement (Aquatic)
Effect: Terrain Attunement (Aquatic).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.E8SDesgMD6Zbye2j]{Dedykacja Geomancer}

You gain a swim Speed equal to your land Speed.

Effect: Terrain Attunement (Arctic).name: Efekt: Terrain Attunement (Arctic)
Effect: Terrain Attunement (Arctic).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.E8SDesgMD6Zbye2j]{Dedykacja Geomancer}

Enemies take a –5-foot status penalty to their Speeds (-10-foot on a critical failure).

Effect: Terrain Attunement (Mountain).name: Efekt: Terrain Attunement (Mountain)
Effect: Terrain Attunement (Mountain).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.E8SDesgMD6Zbye2j]{Dedykacja Geomancer}

You gain resistance to physical damage (except adamantine) equal to the spell rank.

Effect: Terrain Attunement (Plains).name: Efekt: Terrain Attunement (Plains)
Effect: Terrain Attunement (Plains).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.E8SDesgMD6Zbye2j]{Dedykacja Geomancer}

You gain temporary Hit Points equal to the spell rank.

Effect: Terrain Attunement (Underground).name: Efekt: Terrain Attunement (Underground)
Effect: Terrain Attunement (Underground).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.E8SDesgMD6Zbye2j]{Dedykacja Geomancer}

You gain darkvision as well as imprecise tremorsense out to 15 feet.

Effect: Terrain Shield.name: Efekt: Terrain Shield
Effect: Terrain Shield.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.TNRB8IY6Wtk9BoMp]{Terrain Shield}

You gain resistance to physical damage equal to double your level against the triggering Strike.

Effect: Terrifying Mien.name: Efekt: Terrifying Mien
Effect: Terrifying Mien.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Egx5NWOVhoaij7a3]{Terrifying Mien}

You gain resistance against bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage against Strikes made by creatures with the frightened condition. This resistance is equal to four times the value of that creature's frightened condition.

Effect: The Bigger They Are.name: Efekt: The Bigger They Are
Effect: The Bigger They Are.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.azF1RvMTwCPaJr1F]{The Bigger They Are}

You gain weakness to the origin's precision damage.

Effect: The Proud.name: Efekt: The Proud
Effect: The Proud.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.GF9uIGA947DiC2dR]{The Proud}

You take a –1 status penalty to attack rolls, damage rolls, and skill checks against creatures other than the exemplar, and a +1 status bonus to these rolls when targeting the exemplar.

Effect: Thermal Nimbus.name: Efekt: Thermal Nimbus
Effect: Thermal Nimbus.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.XJCsa3UbQtsKcqve]{Thermal Nimbus}

You gain cold or fire resistance.

Effect: Thoughtform Summoning.name: Efekt: Thoughtform Summoning
Effect: Thoughtform Summoning.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.pqVG9mRKcXg5Rsjc]{Thoughtform Summoning}

You gain resistance to physical damage equal to half its level and weakness 5 to force and mental damage.

Effect: Tidal Shield.name: Efekt: Tidal Shield
Effect: Tidal Shield.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.bPPcPUZMlJ7m5lYq]{Tidal Shield}

You gain a +4 circumstance bonus to AC.

Effect: Tiller's Drive.name: Efekt: Tiller's Drive
Effect: Tiller's Drive.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Wo0HNBh6CCgPN3Co]{Tiller's Drive}

Members of your crop receive a +5-foot circumstance bonus to Speed.

Effect: To War!.name: Efekt: To War!
Effect: To War!.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.1fH3M3XaUWWOJZFM]{To War!}

You gain a number of temporary Hit Points equal to the origin's level and a +2 status bonus to damage against any foe damaged by the origin's apocalypse mount.

Effect: Tome Adept Benefit.name: Efekt: Tome Adept Benefit
Effect: Tome Adept Benefit.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.MyN1cQgE0HsLF20e]{Tome}

You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to your next attack roll against the marked creature. If you have the tome's paragon benefit, this bonus applies to all attack rolls.

Effect: Topple Giants.name: Efekt: Topple Giants
Effect: Topple Giants.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.RHEdvEFz3QKiRKlr]{Topple Giants}

When an ally within your overwatch field attempts to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Dt6B1slsBy8ipJu9]{Rozbrojenie}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.7blmbDrQFNfdT731]{Odepchnięcie}, or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.ge56Lu1xXVFYUnLP]{Podcięcie} an opponent within your overwatch field and fails, you coordinate efforts to provide a +2 circumstance bonus to the next Athletics check rolled by a different ally to attempt the same action on the same target before that target's next turn.

Effect: Towering Presence.name: Efekt: Towering Presence
Effect: Towering Presence.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.t3Eky3ijnAJTiCV5]{Towering Presence}

You increase your size your size to Large. Your reach increases by 5 feet (or by 10 feet if you started out Tiny), and you gain a +2 status bonus to melee damage.

Effect: Treat Wounds Immunity.name: Efekt: Treat Wounds Immunity
Effect: Treat Wounds Immunity.description: Granted when someone uses @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.1kGNdIIhuglAjIp9]{Opatrywanie Ran} on you, rendering you temporarily immune to Treat Wounds for the duration.

Effect: Tributary Circulation.name: Efekt: Tributary Circulation
Effect: Tributary Circulation.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.0HgfWQMIo2UEAlAm]{Tributary Circulation}

You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to Will saves and saves against poison.

Effect: Turn Aside Ambient Magic.name: Efekt: Turn Aside Ambient Magic
Effect: Turn Aside Ambient Magic.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.5g0gCXJnUVipYtW0]{Turn Aside Ambient Magic}

Choose acid, cold, electricity, fire, or sonic damage. You gain resistance against the chosen damage type equal to half your level.

Effect: Turn Back The Clock.name: Efekt: Turn Back The Clock
Effect: Turn Back The Clock.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.3aG0gkHulBIHqqGE]{Turn Back the Clock}

You reroll the triggering check with a +1 circumstance bonus.

Effect: Twin Parry.name: Efekt: Bliźniacza Parada
Effect: Twin Parry.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Y8LHfkzGyOhPlUou]{Bliźniaczą Paradę}, jeśli żadna z broni nie ma cechy parowanie.

Zyskujesz premię sytuacyjną +1 do KP do początku swojej następnej tury.

Effect: Twin Parry (Parry Trait).name: Efekt: Bliźniacza Parada (Cecha Parowanie)
Effect: Twin Parry (Parry Trait).description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Y8LHfkzGyOhPlUou]{Bliźniaczą Paradę}, jeśli którakolwiek z broni ma cechę parowanie.

Zyskujesz premię sytuacyjną +2 do KP do początku swojej następnej tury.

Effect: Ultimatum of Liberation.name: Efekt: Ultimatum of Liberation
Effect: Ultimatum of Liberation.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.cwBsPU24715fUCub]{Ultimatum of Liberation}

You gain a +2 status bonus to Will saving throws against effects produced by the oppressing creature and their allies, which increases to +3 if they are within 30 feet of the origin.

Effect: Uncanny Bombs.name: Efekt: Uncanny Bombs
Effect: Uncanny Bombs.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.9Ht1eyBHsB1swpeE]{Uncanny Bombs}

You reduce any circumstance bonus to the target's AC from cover by 1.

Effect: Undead Blood Magic.name: Efekt: Undead Blood Magic
Effect: Undead Blood Magic.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.7WBZ2kkhZ7JorWu2]{Bloodline: Undead}

You gain temporary Hit Points equal to the spell's rank for 1 round.

Effect: Undying Conviction.name: Efekt: Nieśmiertelne Przekonanie
Effect: Undying Conviction.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.xSYkYRKlSyLzPrH1]{Nieśmiertelne Przekonanie}

Nieumarłe zyskują premię statusową +2 do rzutów obronnych przeciwko obrażeniom od witalności oraz do rzutów obronnych woli przeciwko efektom, które mogłyby je kontrolować.

Effect: Undying Ferocity.name: Efekt: Undying Ferocity
Effect: Undying Ferocity.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.zZOycr00XDVTKuXa]{Undying Ferocity}

You gain temporary Hit Points equal to your level.

Effect: Unending Subsistence.name: Efekt: Unending Subsistence
Effect: Unending Subsistence.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.RR0p9E6GWt0CRA1q]{Unending Subsistence}

You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to Fortitude saving throws.

Effect: Unfazed Assessment.name: Efekt: Unfazed Assessment
Effect: Unfazed Assessment.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.ZyQYP7i26DWhMNux]{Unfazed Assessment}

You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to AC and saving throws against the target creature's attacks (or a +2 circumstance bonus for a critical success).

Effect: Unleash Psyche.name: Efekt: Uwolnienie Psyche
Effect: Unleash Psyche.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.7GeguyqyD1TjoC4r]{Uwolnienie Psyche}

When you cast a damaging spell, you gain a status bonus to its damage equal to double the spell's rank. This applies only to spells that don't have a duration and that you cast using psychic spellcasting.

Effect: Unleash Yaoguai Might.name: Efekt: Unleash Yaoguai Might
Effect: Unleash Yaoguai Might.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.fjB514XFJG4V3wMy]{Unleash Yaoguai Might}

Częstotliwość raz na dzień

As you enter your yaoguai form, you draw upon your internal magic to assume an even greater form. When you Change Shape to enter your yaoguai form, you can spend an additional action to gain the effects of @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.wzctak6BxOW8xvFV]{Powiększenie} and an additional effect based on your heritage. This effect persists for 1 minute or until you Change Shape again.

  • Animal Your hide thickens, granting a +1 circumstance bonus to AC.
  • Celestial You recover some of your celestial perfection, granting you and all allies within 15 feet a +1 status bonus to attack rolls.
  • Elements You're surrounded in wind and dust, granting concealment each round that you spend at least 1 action that has the move trait. You can't use this concealment to Hide or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.VMozDqMMuK5kpoX4]{Przekradanie Się}, as normal for sources of obvious concealment.
  • Object Your skin transmutes partially into an inorganic substance, granting resistance 5 to your choice of bludgeoning, piercing, or slashing.
  • Vegetation You trigger an accelerated growth, gaining fast healing 5.

Effect: Unstable Check Failure.name: Efekt: Unstable Check Failure
Effect: Unstable Check Failure.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.jIAgXe2FetAKBwt7]{Innovation} failing an Unstable check

The innovation malfunctions in a spectacular (though harmless) fashion, such as a belch of smoke or shower of sparks, and it becomes incapable of being used for further unstable actions.

Effect: Unwavering Resilience.name: Efekt: Unwavering Resilience
Effect: Unwavering Resilience.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.KofrLYBif2QKyiqe]{Unwavering Resilience}

You gain a number of temporary Hit Point equal to your level.

Effect: Upstage.name: Efekt: Upstage
Effect: Upstage.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.F0JgJR2rXKOg9k1z]{Upstage}

You gain a +1 status bonus to attack rolls, Perception checks, saving throws, and skill checks until the end of your next turn.

Effect: Ursine Avenger Form.name: Efekt: Ursine Avenger Form
Effect: Ursine Avenger Form.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.zV4vzcl7eoVewz5p]{Ursine Avenger Form}

You gain a jaws unarmed attack that deals 1k8 piercing damage and a claws unarmed attack that deals 1k6 slashing damage and has the agile trait.

Effect: Vicious Debilitations.name: Efekt: Vicious Debilitations
Effect: Vicious Debilitations.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.zt5CWn3UrPViwaB3]{Vicious Debilitations}

You gain weakness 5 to your choice of bludgeoning, piercing, or slashing damage.

Effect: Victor's Wreath.name: Efekt: Victor's Wreath
Effect: Victor's Wreath.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.pHUi7KCh1DH5pxMe]{Victor's Wreath}

You gain a +1 status bonus to attack rolls.

Effect: Victorious Vigor.name: Efekt: Victorious Vigor
Effect: Victorious Vigor.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.YeVDITJplindA27l]{Victorious Vigor}

You gain temporary Hit Points equal to your Constitution modifier until the end of your next turn.

Effect: Vigorous Anthem.name: Efekt: Vigorous Anthem
Effect: Vigorous Anthem.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.4SKech3n0F38HrR5]{Vigorous Anthem}

You gain temporary HP equal to 3 + the source's Charisma modifier.

Effect: Vindication Edge.name: Efekt: Vindication Edge
Effect: Vindication Edge.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.QOOwC3S41CKGkxlN]{Vindicator}

You take a –1 status penalty to their saving throws against divine spells.

Effect: Virulent Strike.name: Efekt: Virulent Strike
Effect: Virulent Strike.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.fns6SMiYrUeL6cnx]{Virulent Strike}

You take a –4 circumstance penalty to the save against a disease or poison.

Effect: Vivacious Bravado.name: Efekt: Vivacious Bravado
Effect: Vivacious Bravado.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.2MHzEh1KUQEbhjUf]{Vivacious Bravado}.

You gain temporary Hit Points equal to your level plus your Charisma modifier.

Effect: Volatile Grease (Failure).name: Efekt: Volatile Grease (Porażka)
Effect: Volatile Grease (Failure).description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.vKFg7HMNu4cCDD8b]{Volatile Grease}

The target gains weakness 2 to fire for 1 minute.

Wywyższenie (+2) The weakness increases by 1.

Effect: Volatile Grease (Success).name: Efekt: Volatile Grease (Sukces)
Effect: Volatile Grease (Success).description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.vKFg7HMNu4cCDD8b]{Volatile Grease}

The target gains weakness 2 to fire until the end of your next turn.

Wywyższenie (+2) The weakness increases by 1.

Effect: Walking the Cardinal Paths.name: Efekt: Walking the Cardinal Paths
Effect: Walking the Cardinal Paths.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.adventure-specific-actions.Item.GpT5RXUwhINODqkJ]{(Affinity Ablaze) Arms of Balance: Walking the Cardinal Paths}

One of your weapons or your unarmed Strikes deal an additional 2k6 fire, cold, acid, or electricity damage. The Strikes gain the appropriate energy trait as well.

Effect: Watch Your Back.name: Efekt: Watch Your Back
Effect: Watch Your Back.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.zZCyJhsaugHB6mZW]{Watch Your Back}

The target gains a +2 status bonus to Perception checks against you, but it takes a –2 status penalty to Will saves against fear effects.

Effect: Watchful Gaze.name: Efekt: Watchful Gaze
Effect: Watchful Gaze.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.KKUDZUbX3nDdME4K]{Watchful Gaze}

You gain All-Around Vision until the start of your next turn. This lets you see in all directions and prevents you from being flanked.

Effect: Weapon Infusion.name: Efekt: Infuzja Oręża
Effect: Weapon Infusion.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Gvx8Mdg5mxUtTD5g]{Infuzję Oręża}.

Jeśli twoją następną akcją jest Uderzenie Żywiołu, wybierz dla niego broń, której kształt ono przybierze. Możesz zdecydować się zmienić obrażenia uderzenia na cięte, kłute lub obuchowe — cokolwiek odpowiada kształtowi broni — oraz możesz wybrać inne modyfikacje, w zależności od tego czy wyprowadzasz uderzenie w zwarciu czy na dystansowe.

  • W Zwarciu Dodaj do uderzenia jedną cechę wybraną spośród poniższych: chyżość, impet, wysięg, zamaszystość, zwrotność.
  • Dystansowe Wybierz jedną z trzech opcji: inkrement zasięgu 100 stóp oraz cecha salwa 30 stóp, inkrement zasięgu 50 stóp oraz cecha impulsowość lub inkrement zasięgu 20 stóp i cecha miotanie.

Effect: Weapon Tampered With (Critical S.name: Efekt: Majstrowano Przy Broni (Krytyczny Sukces)
Effect: Weapon Tampered With (Critical S.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.SheifYobjKqyK3Fv]{Majstrowanie}

Ktoś majstrował przy twojej broni! Ponosisz karę sytuacyjną –2 do rzutów ataku i rzutów obrażeń tą bronią. Efekt trwa, dopóki nie użyjesz @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.pvQ5rY2zrtPI614F]{Interakcji} do usunięcia go.

Effect: Weapon Tampered With (Success).name: Efekt: Majstrowano Przy Broni (Sukces)
Effect: Weapon Tampered With (Success).description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.SheifYobjKqyK3Fv]{Majstrowanie}

Ktoś majstrował przy twojej broni! Ponosisz karę sytuacyjną –2 do rzutów ataku i rzutów obrażeń tą bronią. Efekt kończy się na początku następnej tury wynalazcy, lub kiedy użyjesz @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.pvQ5rY2zrtPI614F]{Interakcji} do usunięcia go.

Effect: Web.name: Efekt: Web
Effect: Web.description: The target takes a –10-foot circumstance penalty to its Speeds.

Effect: Whispers of Weakness.name: Efekt: Whispers of Weakness
Effect: Whispers of Weakness.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.55WR55op9BIdgF1B]{Whispers of Weakness}

You target one creature. You gain a +2 status bonus to your next attack roll (or skill check made as part of an attack action) against that foe.

Effect: Wild Mimic Dedication.name: Efekt: Wild Mimic Dedication
Effect: Wild Mimic Dedication.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.U9mK9TXbGriGeMOW]{Wild Mimic Dedication}

You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to your saving throws against the next attack or ability that the subject of your Recall Knowledge targets you with.

Effect: Wings of Air.name: Efekt: Wings of Air
Effect: Wings of Air.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.FUOUyhHufNH4ri7H]{Wings of Air}

You gain a fly Speed equal to your land Speed.

Effect: Wish for Luck.name: Efekt: Wish for Luck
Effect: Wish for Luck.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.N6U02s9qJKQIvmQd]{Wish for Luck}

Roll the attack roll, saving throw, or skill check twice and take the higher result.

Effect: Witch's Charge.name: Efekt: Witch's Charge
Effect: Witch's Charge.description: Granted when you designate someone as your @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.52QyoGaysrfBOy5H]{Witch's Charge}.

Effect: Wither Away.name: Efekt: Wither Away
Effect: Wither Away.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.hmpkzEQV6kTFxPan]{Wither Away}

You take the following penalties depending on the result

  • Arms You become enfeebled 1.
  • Head You become stupefied 1.
  • Legs You take a –10-foot status penalty to your Speeds.
  • Torso You gain weakness 10 to slashing damage.

Effect: Wood Impulse Junction.name: Efekt: Węzeł Impulsu Drewna
Effect: Wood Impulse Junction.description: Zyskujesz tymczasowe Punkty Żywotności w liczbie równej twojemu poziomowi.

Effect: Worm Form.name: Efekt: Worm Form
Effect: Worm Form.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.jynhIXH1zEavQA7v]{Worm Form}

You take on the form of a purple worm or transform into a humanoid-worm hybrid, retaining your own head but with a worm's body, transforming into a Huge battle form. You must have enough space to expand into or the ability is lost. While in this form, you gain the animal trait. You can Dismiss the form.

You gain the following statistics and abilities regardless of which battle form you choose:

  • AC = 20 + your level. Ignore your armor's check penalty and Speed reduction.
  • 40 temporary Hit Points.
  • Darkvision.
  • One or more unarmed melee attacks specific to the battle form you choose, which are the only attacks you can Strike with. You're trained with them. Your attack modifier is +25, and you use the listed damage. Melee attacks are Strength based (for the purpose of the enfeebled condition, for example). If your unarmed attack modifier is higher, you can use it instead.
  • Athletics modifier of +30, unless your own modifier is higher.

You also gain specific abilities based on the type of monster you choose:

  • Purple Worm Speed 40 feet, burrow 30 feet, swim 20 feet
    • Melee 1 jaws (deadly 2k10, reach 15 feet), Damage 3k10+15 piercing
    • Melee 1 stinger (agile, poison, reach 15 feet), Damage 2k12+15 piercing plus 2k6 persistent poison
    • Melee 1 body (reach 15 feet) Damage 1k10+13 bludgeoning
  • Hybrid Speed 40 feet
    • Melee 1 stinger (agile, poison, reach 10 feet), Damage 2k12+15 piercing plus 1k6 persistent poison
    • Melee 1 body (reach 10 feet), Damage 1k10+13 bludgeoning
    • Hybrid Caster You retain the ability to speak, and can cast spells as long as they don't have somatic or material components.

Effect: Wyrmblessed Blood Magic.name: Efekt: Wyrmblessed Blood Magic
Effect: Wyrmblessed Blood Magic.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.dKTb959aCQIzSIXj]{Bloodline: Wyrmblessed}

Either you gain a +1 status bonus to Intimidation checks for 1 round, or a target takes a –1 status penalty to Will saves for 1 round.

Effect: You Can't Kill an Idea.name: Efekt: You Can't Kill an Idea
Effect: You Can't Kill an Idea.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.R5oeNpNCOXU4OtIT]{You Can't Kill an Idea}

Your Aid circumstance bonus increases by 1.

Effect: You're an Embarrassment.name: Efekt: You're an Embarrassment
Effect: You're an Embarrassment.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.13bMIkqXpKt9pxAm]{You're an Embarrassment!}

You reroll the triggering Will saving throw with a +1 circumstance bonus.

Effect: Zealous Inevitability.name: Efekt: Zealous Inevitability
Effect: Zealous Inevitability.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.eaw645inkbHNylgC]{Zealous Inevitability}

You take a status penalty to your saving throws against divine spells equal to your doomed value.

Stance: Air Shroud.name: Postawa: Air Shroud
Stance: Air Shroud.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.QV4NCyZQBCABykS1]{Air Shroud}

Attacks with ranged weapons take a –1 circumstance penalty to their attack rolls if their paths pass through your kinetic aura. Air in your kinetic aura is difficult terrain for flying creatures other than yourself.

Stance: Arcane Cascade.name: Postawa: Tajemna Kaskada
Stance: Arcane Cascade.description:
Zapewniana przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.HbejhIywqIufrmVM]{Tajemną Kaskadę}

Twoje ciosy w zwarciu zadają dodatkowy 1 punkt obrażeń od mocy. Te obrażenia zwiększają się do 2 jeśli masz specjalizację w broni i do 3 jeśli masz większą specjalizację w broni. Jakikolwiek cios który odnosi korzyści z tych dodatkowych obrażeń zyskuje cechę "Magia Tajemna" co czyni go magicznym.

Jeśli twoje ostatnio użyte przez wejściem w postawę zaklęcie mogło zadawać obrażenia, obrażenia zadawane przez postawę są zamiast tego takiego samego typu, co obrażenia zadawane przez zaklęcie (lub jednego wybranego przez ciebie typu spośród kilku, które mogło zadawać zaklęcie).

Stance: Assume Earth's Mantle.name: Postawa: Assume Earth's Mantle
Stance: Assume Earth's Mantle.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.vV0nW9OIJ0VdeVjy]{Assume Earth's Mantle}

  • You become Large if you were smaller. This increases your reach by 5 feet (or by 10 feet if you started out Tiny).
  • You gain a climb Speed equal to your land Speed, but you can use it only to climb surfaces of earthen matter.
  • The armor grants you a +1 circumstance bonus to your Fortitude saves and a +2 circumstance bonus to your Fortitude or Reflex DCs against attempts to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.7blmbDrQFNfdT731]{Odepchnięcie} you, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.ge56Lu1xXVFYUnLP]{Podcięcie} you, or knock you @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Powalony}.
  • If your Strength is below +4, this armor raises your Strength to +4. If your Strength is +4 or higher, this armor grants you a +1 item bonus to your Strength.
  • If you have the Armor in Earth impulse, you can add its effects to Assume Earth's Mantle.

Stance: Buckler Dance.name: Postawa: Buckler Dance
Stance: Buckler Dance.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.tDWc2LQNl0Op1Auq]{Buckler Dance}

You constantly have your buckler raised as if you'd used Raise a Shield.

Stance: Bullet Dancer Stance.name: Postawa: Postawa Tancerza Pocisków
Stance: Bullet Dancer Stance.description:
Zapewniana przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.SMF1hTWPHtmlS8Cd]{Postawa Tancerza Pocisków}

Będąc w tej postawie możesz zadawać Ciosy jedynie z użyciem bagnetów, wzmocnionych kolb, prostej broni palnej i prostej broni kombinacyjnej. Możesz wykonać za pomocą tych broni @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.nbfNETdpee8CVM17]{Grad Ciosów}. Możesz również używać innych atutów i zdolności Mnicha, które posiadasz, za pomocą bagnetów, wzmacnianych kolb i elementów do walki w zwarciu prostych broni kombinacyjnych, tak długo jak wymieniony atut lub zdolność nie wymaga jednego konkretnego Ciosu do jego zastosowania. Możesz też używać ich z prostymi broniami palnymi atakując do połowy pierwszego inkrementu ich zasięgu.

Stance: Claw Stance.name: Postawa: Claw Stance
Stance: Claw Stance.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.zs4ZMcH9oFSCgkBx]{Claw Stance}

The only Strikes you can make are frenzied claw unarmed attacks. These deal 1k6 slashing damage, are in the brawling group, and have the agile, finesse, grapple, unarmed, and versatile piercing traits.

Stance: Clinging Shadows Stance.name: Postawa: Clinging Shadows Stance
Stance: Clinging Shadows Stance.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.uJXs4M6IeixfPBLc]{Clinging Shadows Stance}

You can make shadow grasp Strikes. These deal 1k4 void damage; are in the brawling group; and have the agile, grapple, reach, and unarmed traits.

While in the clinging shadows stance, you gain a +2 circumstance bonus to Athletics checks to Grapple, and to the DC for creatures to Escape from you.

Stance: Cobra Stance.name: Postawa: Cobra Stance
Stance: Cobra Stance.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.AkV4Jyllo6nlK2Sl]{Cobra Stance}

The only Strikes you can make are cobra fang unarmed attacks. These deal 1k4 piercing damage; are in the brawling group; and have the agile, deadly k10, finesse, unarmed, and venomous traits.

You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to Fortitude saves and your Fortitude DC, and you gain poison resistance equal to half your level.

Stance: Cobra Stance (Cobra Envenom).name: Postawa: Cobra Stance (Cobra Envenom)
Stance: Cobra Stance (Cobra Envenom).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.AkV4Jyllo6nlK2Sl]{Cobra Stance} if you have @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.xQuNswWB3eg1UM28]{Cobra Envenom}, which increases the circumstance bonus to Fortitude saves and Fortitude DC to +2.

The only Strikes you can make are cobra fang unarmed attacks. These deal 1k4 poison damage; are in the brawling group; and have the agile, deadly k10, finesse, nonlethal, poison, and unarmed traits.

You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to Fortitude saves and your Fortitude DC, and you gain poison resistance equal to half your level.

Stance: Crane Stance.name: Postawa: Crane Stance
Stance: Crane Stance.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.bf7NCeKqDClaqhTR]{Crane Stance}

You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to AC, but the only Strikes you can make are crane wing attacks. These deal 1k6 bludgeoning damage; are in the brawling group; and have the agile, finesse, nonlethal, and unarmed traits.

Reduce the DC for High Jump and Long Jump by 5, and when you Leap, you can move an additional 5 feet horizontally or 2 feet vertically.

Stance: Crowned in Tempest's Fury.name: Postawa: Crowned in Tempest's Fury
Stance: Crowned in Tempest's Fury.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.8iHpUB0bYaHh86Kk]{Crowned in Tempest's Fury}

  • Any creature that enters your kinetic aura or ends its turn there takes 2k12 electricity damage.
  • If you don't have a fly Speed, you gain a 20-foot fly Speed. If you have the Cyclonic Ascent impulse, you instead gain that fly Speed and the extra benefits.
  • You gain a +10-foot status bonus to all your Speeds.
  • Your air Elemental Blasts deal an additional 1k12 electricity damage.

Stance: Desert Wind.name: Postawa: Desert Wind
Stance: Desert Wind.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.ti6rPcSBsCuyEHqy]{Desert Wind}

Each creature inside your kinetic aura (including you) is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Przysłonięty} from any creature outside your kinetic aura, and creatures outside the aura are concealed from creatures inside the aura other than you. Your air impulses carry sands that cut at great speed.

When you use a damaging air impulse that affects at least one creature in your kinetic aura, that impulse deals 1 additional slashing damage, or 2 if the impulse has a single target.

Poziom (+2) The extra damage increases by 1, or 2 if the impulse has a single target.

Stance: Devrin's Cunning Stance.name: Postawa: Devrin's Cunning Stance
Stance: Devrin's Cunning Stance.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.OqqytsF2RIjB0EPR]{Devrin's Cunning Stance}

Your aura grants you and your allies a +1 status bonus to skill checks. When you or an ally in the aura Strike an off-guard enemy, that enemy can't use reactions until the beginning of its next turn.

Stance: Disarming Stance.name: Postawa: Disarming Stance
Stance: Disarming Stance.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.1p5ErCp33nGOzEsk]{Disarming Stance}.

You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to Athletics checks to Disarm and a +2 circumstance bonus to your Reflex DC when defending against checks to Disarm you.

Stance: Disruptive Stance.name: Postawa: Disruptive Stance
Stance: Disruptive Stance.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.OEGhbRgW6wRbccns]{Disruptive Stance}

You can use Reactive Strike when a creature within your reach uses a concentrate action, in addition to manipulate and move actions.

Furthermore, you disrupt a triggering concentrate or manipulate action if your Strike hits (not only if it's a critical hit).

Stance: Divine Presence.name: Postawa: Divine Presence
Stance: Divine Presence.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.2uYigDgvlfCZVg9e]{Divine Presence}

You have a 5-foot emanation that has the aura trait. You can Sustain the emanation to increase its radius by 5 feet, up to a maximum of 15 feet.

An enemy that ends its turn completely within the emanation is Off-Guard to your Strikes.

Stance: Dragon Stance.name: Postawa: Dragon Stance
Stance: Dragon Stance.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.8sy3sHwOHS4ImwvJ]{Dragon Stance}

You can make dragon tail attacks that deal 1k10 bludgeoning damage. They are in the brawling group and have the backswing, nonlethal, and unarmed traits.

You can ignore the first square of difficult terrain while Striding.

Stance: Dread Marshal Stance.name: Postawa: Dread Marshal Stance
Stance: Dread Marshal Stance.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.R7c4PyTNkZb0yvoT]{Dread Marshal Stance}.

Your marshal's aura grants you and allies a status bonus to damage rolls equal to the number of weapon damage dice of the unarmed attack or weapon the you are wielding that has the most weapon damage dice. When you or an ally in the aura critically hits an enemy with a Strike, that enemy is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Przerażony 1}.

Stance: Drifting Pollen.name: Postawa: Drifting Pollen
Stance: Drifting Pollen.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.7W5oubPLcxHJdcHX]{Drifting Pollen}

A creature in your kinetic aura when you enter the stance, or who later enters the aura or ends its turn in the aura, attempts at a Fortitude save against your class DC. On a failure, it's sickened 1 (sickened 2 on a critical failure) and dazzled until it's no longer sickened. A creature attempts this save no more than once per round and doesn't attempt a new save if already affected.

Stance: Dueling Dance.name: Postawa: Dueling Dance
Stance: Dueling Dance.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.9VGmE7X4aK2W8YWj]{Dueling Dance (Swashbuckler)} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.FYz5eQeTox9IDkSd]{Dueling Dance (Fighter)}

You constantly have the benefits of Dueling Parry or Extravagant Parry.

Stance: Everstand Stance.name: Postawa: Everstand Stance
Stance: Everstand Stance.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.6GN1zh3RcnZhrzxP]{Everstand Stance}

You wield the shield with both hands. When wielding a shield this way, increase the weapon damage die of the shield's boss or spikes by one step, and increase the shield's Hardness by 2 when using the Shield Block reaction.

Stance: Fane's Fourberie.name: Postawa: Fane's Fourberie
Stance: Fane's Fourberie.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.80CEAB05TP5ki9iW]{Fane's Fourberie}

Choose whether to treat playing cards in your possession as daggers or darts; you can wield a playing card in all ways as the chosen weapon until the stance ends.

Stance: Flood Stance.name: Postawa: Flood Stance
Stance: Flood Stance.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.lqStZou2d2WMLJxz]{Flood Stance}

The only Strikes you can make are flooded river unarmed attacks. These deal 1k8 bludgeoning damage; are in the brawling group; have the nonlethal, trip, unarmed, and water traits; and don't take the normal penalty for being used underwater. They also gain the forceful trait while you're underwater.

Stance: Geologic Attunement.name: Postawa: Geologic Attunement
Stance: Geologic Attunement.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.YRanyv890fLiyaOY]{Geologic Attunement}

You gain tremorsense (imprecise) in your kinetic aura.

At 13th level this becomes precise tremorsense.

Stance: Ghosts in the Storm.name: Postawa: Ghosts in the Storm
Stance: Ghosts in the Storm.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.ABL4daQ7c65d0tEM]{Ghosts in the Storm}

You and your allies while they're in your kinetic aura gain a +2 status bonus to Reflex saves and Acrobatics checks. When an affected creature uses a move action, clouds dance around it. Until the start of its next turn, it's concealed, and its Strikes gain the shock rune.

Stance: Gorilla Stance.name: Postawa: Gorilla Stance
Stance: Gorilla Stance.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.DqD7htz8Sd1dh3BT]{Gorilla Stance}

The only Strikes you can make are gorilla slam unarmed attacks. These deal 1k8 bludgeoning damage; are in the brawling group; and have the backswing, forceful, grapple, nonlethal, and unarmed traits.

You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to Athletics checks to Climb, and if you roll a success on an Athletics check to Climb, you get a critical success instead.

Stance: Gorilla Stance (Gorilla Pound).name: Postawa: Gorilla Stance (Gorilla Pound)
Stance: Gorilla Stance (Gorilla Pound).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.DqD7htz8Sd1dh3BT]{Gorilla Stance} if you have @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.nRjyyDulHnP5OewA]{Gorilla Pound}, which grants you a climb speed of 15 while you are in this stance.

The only Strikes you can make are gorilla slam unarmed attacks. These deal 1k8 bludgeoning damage; are in the brawling group; and have the backswing, forceful, grapple, nonlethal, and unarmed traits.

You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to Athletics checks to Climb, and if you roll a success on an Athletics check to Climb, you get a critical success instead.

2.text: If you roll a success on an Athletics check to Climb, you get a critical success instead.

Stance: Graceful Poise.name: Postawa: Graceful Poise
Stance: Graceful Poise.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.rFaUJtB46scuAidY]{Graceful Poise}

When you make your second Strike from Double Slice with an agile weapon, Double Slice counts as one attack when calculating your multiple attack penalty.

Stance: Immovable Object.name: Postawa: Immovable Object
Stance: Immovable Object.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.R8MaoG7CzHZmQYtM]{Immovable Object}

While in this stance and on the ground, you are immune to forced movement and if an effect would knock you prone, you aren't knocked prone and can Step as a free action.

Stance: Impassable Wall Stance.name: Postawa: Impassable Wall Stance
Stance: Impassable Wall Stance.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.YeyOqNFKaeuOTiJr]{Impassable Wall Stance}

When you critically hit with a Reactive Strike triggered by a move action, you disrupt that move action.

Stance: Inspiring Marshal Stance.name: Postawa: Inspiring Marshal Stance
Stance: Inspiring Marshal Stance.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.bvOsJNeI0ewvQsFa]{Inspiring Marshal Stance}.

Your marshal's aura grants you and allies a +1 status bonus to attack rolls and saves against mental effects.

Stance: Intensified Element Stance.name: Postawa: Intensified Element Stance
Stance: Intensified Element Stance.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.qOGD3K8VlQAAjsWy]{Intensified Element Stance}

Your Strikes and damaging spells deal an additional 1k6 damage against certain creatures, depending on the type of elemental medicine expended. If the person who crafted the elemental medicine expended was legendary in the skill they used, increased this damage to 2k6.

  • Earth acid damage against water creatures

  • Fire fire damage against metal creatures and constructs that are primarily metallic

  • Metal electricity damage against wood or plant creatures and constructs primarily made of wood or plant matter

  • Water sonic damage against fire creatures

  • Wood cold damage against earth creatures and constructs that are primarily made of rock or earth

Stance: Ironblood Stance.name: Postawa: Ironblood Stance
Stance: Ironblood Stance.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.x9cYkB8DrUBBwqJd]{Ironblood Stance}

You can make iron sweep unarmed attacks. These deal 1k8 bludgeoning damage; are in the brawling group; and have the nonlethal, parry, sweep, and unarmed traits.

While in Ironblood Stance, you gain resistance 2 to all damage. The resistance increases to 3 at 12th level, to 4 at 16th level, and to 5 at 20th level.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-effects.Item.fRlvmul3LbLo2xvR]{Efekt: Parry}

Stance: Jellyfish Stance.name: Postawa: Jellyfish Stance
Stance: Jellyfish Stance.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Jwq5o13uZF3ooln1]{Jellyfish Stance}

You can make stinging lash attacks that deal 1k6 slashing damage. These attacks are in the brawling group, and have the finesse, nonlethal, reach, and unarmed traits.

You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to Reflex saves and on checks to Escape and Squeeze.

Stance: Kaiju Stance.name: Postawa: Kaiju Stance
Stance: Kaiju Stance.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.RwOGkOLCalt4sqz6]{Kaiju Stance}

You become Large and are clumsy 1. The only Strikes you can make are shattering earth attacks. These strikes deal 1k8 bludgeoning damage, are in the brawling group, and have the backswing, fatal k12, reach, and unarmed traits. On a critical success with a shattering earth attack, all creatures other than you that are within 10 feet of the target, including the target itself, take 1 point of bludgeoning splash damage per weapon damage die.

You ignore difficult terrain.

Stance: Kindle Inner Flames.name: Postawa: Kindle Inner Flames
Stance: Kindle Inner Flames.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.ySeT8hrMEPF9AsQu]{Kindle Inner Flames}

You shed faint, glowing embers, as do your allies while they're in your kinetic aura. Anyone shedding these embers gains a +1 status bonus to Reflex saves and Acrobatics checks and can Step as a free action once per round. When an affected creature takes a move action, its Strikes deal an extra @Damage[2[fire]] damage until the end of its turn.

Poziom (12th) The status bonus to Reflex saves and Acrobatics checks is +2, and the Strikes gain the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.XszNvxnymWYRaoTp]{Flaming} rune instead of the extra 2 fire damage.

Stance: Lunging Stance.name: Postawa: Lunging Stance
Stance: Lunging Stance.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.ZghzLmYgeE19GqjP]{Lunging Stance}

You can use Reactive Strike against a creature that is outside your reach but within the reach you would have with a Lunge. If you do, you increase your range with the Strike by 5 feet.

Stance: Magnetic Field.name: Postawa: Magnetic Field
Stance: Magnetic Field.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.YJCAiNpFbX2MIc0G]{Magnetic Field}

Choose a polarity when you take this action. You can switch the polarity as a free action at the start of each of your turns while you remain in this stance.

Attract A creature that is wearing metal armor, has the metal trait, or is made of metal treats squares in your kinetic aura as difficult terrain when moving away from you. You pull unattended metal objects of light Bulk or less in your kinetic aura to you. They gather in your space and move with you.

Repel A creature that is wearing metal armor, has the metal trait, or is made of metal treats squares in your kinetic aura as difficult terrain when moving closer to you. You push unattended metal objects of light Bulk or less in your kinetic aura away. They stop moving once they're outside your aura.

Stance: Masquerade of Seasons Stance.name: Postawa: Masquerade of Seasons Stance
Stance: Masquerade of Seasons Stance.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.KMVXUgFArcftg1jQ]{Masquerade of Seasons Stance}

Choose one of the following traits: water, fire, void, or cold. You gain resistance to damage dealt by effects with the chosen trait.

Stance: Mobile Shot Stance.name: Postawa: Mobile Shot Stance
Stance: Mobile Shot Stance.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.rByA8NDI6ZtNgBeT]{Mobile Shot Stance}

Your ranged Strikes don't trigger Attacks of Opportunity or other reactions that are triggered by a ranged attack.

If you have @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.KAVf7AmRnbCAHrkT]{Reactive Strike}, you can use it with a loaded ranged weapon you're wielding. The triggering creature must be within 5 feet of you for you to do so.

Stance: Monastic Archer Stance.name: Postawa: Monastic Archer Stance
Stance: Monastic Archer Stance.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.YG2RxXE9SMfwo6wP]{Monastic Archer Stance}

The only Strikes you can make are those using longbows, shortbows, or bows with the monk trait.

You can use @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.nbfNETdpee8CVM17]{Grad Ciosów} with these bows. You can use your other monk feats or monk abilities that normally require unarmed attacks with these bows when attacking within half the first range increment (normally 50 feet for a longbow and 30 feet for a shortbow), so long as the feat or ability doesn't require a single, specific Strike.

Stance: Mountain Stance.name: Postawa: Mountain Stance
Stance: Mountain Stance.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.ZL5UU9quCTvcWzfY]{Mountain Stance}

The only Strikes you can make are falling stone unarmed attacks. These deal 1k8 bludgeoning damage; are in the brawling group; and have the forceful, nonlethal, and unarmed traits.

You gain a +4 item bonus to AC and a +2 circumstance bonus to any defenses against being Shoved or Tripped. However, you have a Dexterity modifier cap to your AC of +0, meaning you don't add your Dexterity to your AC, and your Speeds are all reduced by 5 feet. The item bonus to AC from Mountain Stance is cumulative with armor potency runes on your explorer's clothing, mage armor, and bracers of armor.

Stance: Multishot Stance.name: Postawa: Multishot Stance
Stance: Multishot Stance.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.RzhnxgiAopWILCvs]{Multishot Stance}.

While you are in this stance, your penalty for Double Shot is reduced to –1, or –2 if you add the extra action to make three Strikes. If you move from your position, this stance ends.

Stance: Orchard's Endurance.name: Postawa: Orchard's Endurance
Stance: Orchard's Endurance.description:
You and your allies in your kinetic aura gain resistance 5 to bludgeoning and piercing damage. In addition, you and your affected allies roll flat checks to recover from persistent damage twice and take the higher result; this is a fortune effect.
